atk-vin02a3:16_10: evaṃ kho upāli adhammakammaṃ hoti avinayakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:16_11: evañca pana saṅgho sātisāro hotī”ti idaṃ virujjhatīti.
atk-vin02a3:16_16: tasmā yadā saṅghena sannipatitvā “idaṃ nāma imassa bhikkhuno kammaṃ karomā”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:16_18: Tassa iminā lakkhaṇena tajjanīyādikammārahassa niyassakammādikaraṇaṃ adhammakammañceva avinayakammañcāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:16_19: Yassa pana bhaṇḍanakārakādīsu aṅgesu aññataraṃ aṅgaṃ atthi,
atk-vin02a3:16_20: tassa ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho yathānuññātesu aṅgesu ca kammesu ca yena kenaci aṅgena yaṃkiñci kammaṃ vavatthapetvā
atk-vin02a3:16_21: taṃ bhikkhuṃ kammārahaṃ katvā kammaṃ kareyya.
atk-vin02a3:17_0: Tattha kiñcāpi tajjanīyakamme bhaṇḍanakārakavasena kammavācā vuttā,
atk-vin02a3:17_1: atha kho bālassa abyattassa āpattibahulassa tajjanīyakammaṃ karontena bālaabyattavaseneva kammavācā kātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:17_2: Evañhi bhūtena vatthunā kataṃ kammaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:17_3: na ca aññassa kammassa vatthunā. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a3:20_8: Imasmiñhi kammakkhandhake ettakena vattaṃ pūritameva hoti.

atk-vin02a3:27_1: Kāyikena davenātiādīsu panettha kāyiko davo nāma kāyakīḷā vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:27_3: Kāyiko anācāro nāma kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadavītikkamo vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:27_5: Kāyikaṃ upaghātikaṃ nāma kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadassa asikkhanabhāvena upahananaṃ vuccati;
atk-vin02a3:30_3: Etadavocāti kiṃ te gahapati therānaṃ paṭiyattanti sabbaṃ vivarāpetvā disvā etaṃ avoca.
atk-vin02a3:30_4: Ekā ca kho idha natthi yadidaṃ tilasaṃguḷikāti yā ayaṃ tilasakkhalikā nāma vuccati,
atk-vin02a3:30_6: Tassa kira gahapatino vaṃse ādimhi eko pūviyo ahosi.
atk-vin02a3:30_7: Tena naṃ thero jātiyā khuṃsetukāmo evamāha.
atk-vin02a3:30_8: Yadeva kiñcīti evaṃ bahuṃ buddhavacanaṃ ratanaṃ pahāya kiñcideva tilasaṃguḷikāvacanaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:30_9: Kukkuṭapotakaudāharaṇena idaṃ dasseti “yathā so neva kākavassitaṃ na kukkuṭavassitaṃ akāsi,
atk-vin02a3:30_10: evaṃ tayāpi neva bhikkhuvacanaṃ na gihivacanaṃ vutta”nti.

atk-vin02a3:37_0: 46. Channavatthusmiṃ – āvāsaparamparañca bhikkhave saṃsathāti sabbāvāsesu ārocetha.
atk-vin02a3:38_1: Bhaṇḍanakārakotiādīsu bhaṇḍanādipaccayā āpannaṃ āpattiṃ ropetvā tassā adassaneyeva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:39_3: Na bhikkhu bhikkhūhīti añño bhikkhu aññehi bhikkhūhi na bhinditabbo.
atk-vin02a3:39_4: Na gihiddhajoti odātavatthāni acchinnadasapupphadasāni ca na dhāretabbāni.

atk-vin02a3:45_9: aññopi aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:45_11: tassa cattāro māse parivāso dātabbo”ti evaṃ mahākhandhake vutto titthiyaparivāso appaṭicchannaparivāso nāma.
atk-vin02a3:45_14: Sesā tayo yena saṅghādisesāpatti āpannā ceva hoti paṭicchāditā ca,
atk-vin02a3:45_16: Tesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ samuccayakkhandhake vakkhāma.
atk-vin02a3:45_18: Tasmā etesu yaṃkiñci parivāsaṃ parivasantā “pārivāsikā”ti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a3:46_0: Pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnanti ṭhapetvā navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ avasesānaṃ antamaso mūlāyapaṭikassanārahādīnampi.
atk-vin02a3:46_5: Tattha sāmīcikammanti ṭhapetvā abhivādanādīni aññassa anucchavikassa bījanavātadānādino ābhisamācārikassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:46_18: tumhākaṃ vinayakammaṃ karothā”ti vatvā vattaṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a3:46_21: Mithu yathāvuḍḍhanti pārivāsikabhikkhūnaṃ aññamaññaṃ yo yo vuḍḍho tena tena navakatarassa sādituṃ.
atk-vin02a3:47_0: Pañca yathāvuḍḍhanti pakatattehipi saddhiṃ vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā eva.
atk-vin02a3:47_1: Tasmā pātimokkhe uddissamāne hatthapāse nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:47_2: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “pāḷiyā anisīditvā pāḷiṃ vihāya hatthapāsaṃ amuñcantena nisīditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:47_3: Pārisuddhiuposathe karīyamāne saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā tattheva nisinnena attano pāḷiyā pārisuddhiuposatho kātabbo.
atk-vin02a3:47_4: Pavāraṇāyapi saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā tattheva nisinnena attano pāḷiyā pavāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:47_5: Saṅghena ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā bhājīyamānaṃ vassikasāṭikampi attano pattaṭṭhāne gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:48_1: Sace hi pārivāsikassa dve tīṇi uddesabhattādīni pāpuṇanti,
atk-vin02a3:48_8: Punadivase sabbapaṭhamaṃ etassa dātabbanti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:48_9: Yadi pana na gaṇhāti na vissajjeti,
atk-vin02a3:48_11: idaṃ oṇojanaṃ nāma pārivāsikasseva odissa anuññātaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a3:48_12: Tassa hi saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisinnassa bhattagge yāgukhajjakādīni pāpuṇanti vā na vā,
atk-vin02a3:48_13: tasmā so “bhikkhāhārena mā kilamitthā”ti idamassa saṅgahakaraṇatthāya odissa anuññātaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:49_0: Bhattanti āgatāgatehi vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā gahetvā gantabbaṃ vihāre saṅghassa catussālabhattaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:49_2: Pāḷiyā pana gantuṃ vā ṭhātuṃ vā na labhati,
atk-vin02a3:49_3: tasmā pāḷito osakkitvā hatthapāse ṭhitena hatthaṃ pasāretvā yathā seno nipatitvā gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a3:49_8: Catussālabhatte pana sace oṇojanaṃ kattukāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a3:49_9: attano atthāya ukkhitte piṇḍe “ajja me bhattaṃ atthi,
atk-vin02a3:49_11: Punadivase dve piṇḍe labhatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:49_14: tattha sāmaṇerānaṃ jeṭṭhakena bhikkhūnaṃ saṅghanavakena hutvā nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:50_2: tattha na upasampādetabbanti upajjhāyena hutvā na upasampādetabbaṃ;
atk-vin02a3:50_5: aññasmiṃ asati vattaṃ nikkhipitvā sāvetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:50_6: Na nissayoti āgantukānaṃ nissayo na dātabbo.
atk-vin02a3:51_0: Na sāmaṇeroti añño sāmaṇero na gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a3:51_13: saṅgho vo ovādadāyakaṃ jānissatī”ti vā “ahaṃ vinayakammaṃ karomi,
atk-vin02a3:51_15: so vo ovādaṃ dassatī”ti vā vattabbā.
atk-vin02a3:52_0: Sā āpattīti sukkavissaṭṭhiyā parivāse dinne sukkavissaṭṭhi nāpajjitabbā.
atk-vin02a3:53_1: Taṃ kammaṃ “akataṃ dukkaṭa”ntiādīhi vā “kiṃ idaṃ kammaṃ nāma kasikammaṃ gorakkhakamma”ntiādīhi vā vacanehi na garahitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:53_5: Na savacanīyaṃ kātabbanti palibodhatthāya vā pakkosanatthāya vā savacanīyaṃ na kātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:53_6: palibodhatthāya hi karonto “ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ savacanīyaṃ karomi,
atk-vin02a3:53_8: yāva na taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasantaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ karoti.
atk-vin02a3:53_10: ehi mayā saddhiṃ vinayadharānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ gacchāmā”ti evaṃ karoti;
atk-vin02a3:54_0: Na anuvādoti vihāre jeṭṭhakaṭṭhānaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:54_1: Pātimokkhuddesakena vā dhammajjhesakena vā na bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:54_2: Nāpi terasasu sammutīsu ekasammutivasenāpi issariyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:54_4: ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo”ti evaṃ pakatattassa okāso na kāretabbo,
atk-vin02a3:54_5: vatthunā vā āpattiyā vā na codetabbo,
atk-vin02a3:54_7: Na bhikkhūhi sampayojetabbanti aññamaññaṃ yojetvā kalaho na kāretabbo.
atk-vin02a3:55_0: Puratoti saṅghattherena hutvā purato na gantabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:55_8: Ayañhi vassaggena attano pattaṭṭhāne seyyaṃ gahetuṃ na labhati.
atk-vin02a3:55_9: Sabbabhikkhūhi vicinitvā gahitāvasesā maṅkulagūthabharitā vettalatādivinaddhā lāmakaseyyā assa dātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:55_11: evaṃ vasanaāvāsopi vassaggena attano pattaṭṭhāne tassa na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:55_12: Sabbabhikkhūhi vicinitvā gahitāvasesā pana rajohatabhūmi jatukamūsikabharitā paṇṇasālā assa dātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:55_13: Sace pakatattā sabbe rukkhamūlikā abbhokāsikā ca honti,
atk-vin02a3:55_18: Vassūpanāyikadivase paccayaṃ ekapasse ṭhatvā vassaggena gaṇhituṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a3:55_20: nibaddhavassāvāsikaṃ senāsanaṃ gaṇhitukāmena vattaṃ nikkhipitvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:56_0: Tena ca so sāditabboti yaṃ assa āsanādipariyantaṃ bhikkhū denti,
atk-vin02a3:56_2: Puresamaṇena vā pacchāsamaṇena vāti ñātipavāritaṭṭhāne “ettake bhikkhū gahetvā āgacchathā”ti nimantitena “bhante,
atk-vin02a3:56_4: etha tattha gacchāmā”ti evaṃ saṃvidhāya bhikkhū puresamaṇe vā pacchāsamaṇe vā katvā na gantabbaṃ. “Bhante,
atk-vin02a3:56_5: asukasmiṃ nāma gāme manussā bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanaṃ icchanti,
atk-vin02a3:56_6: sādhu vatassa sace tesaṃ saṅgahaṃ kareyyāthā”ti evaṃ pana pariyāyena kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:57_0: Na āraññikaṅganti āgatāgatānaṃ ārocetuṃ harāyamānena āraññikadhutaṅgaṃ na samādātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:57_2: tena dutiyaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā araññe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:57_4: Tathā bhattaggādīsu āsanapariyante nisajjāya harāyamānena piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgampi na samādātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:57_5: Yo pana pakatiyāva piṇḍapātiko tassa paṭisedho natthi.
atk-vin02a3:58_0: Na ca tappaccayāti “nīhaṭabhatto hutvā vihāreyeva nisīditvā bhuñjanto rattiyo gaṇayissāmi,
atk-vin02a3:58_1: gacchato me bhikkhuṃ disvā anārocentassa ratticchedo siyā”ti iminā kāraṇena piṇḍapāto na nīharāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a3:58_2: Mā maṃ jāniṃsūti “mā maṃ ekabhikkhupi jānātū”ti ca iminā ajjhāsayena vihāre sāmaṇerehi pacāpetvā bhuñjitumpi na labhati.
atk-vin02a3:58_4: Gilānassa pana navakammaācariyupajjhāyakiccādipasutassa vā vihāreyeva acchituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:59_0: Āgantukenāti kañci vihāraṃ gatena tattha bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:59_3: Atha rukkhamūlādīsu visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitā honti,
atk-vin02a3:60_0: Āgantukassāti attano vasanavihāraṃ āgatassāpi ekassa vā bahūnaṃ vā vuttanayeneva ārocetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:60_2: Sace āgantukā muhuttaṃ vissamitvā vā avissamitvā eva vā vihāramajjhena gacchanti,
atk-vin02a3:60_9: Yepi antovihāraṃ appavisitvā upacārasīmaṃ okkamitvā gacchanti,
atk-vin02a3:60_10: ayañca nesaṃ chattasaddaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddaṃ vā khipitasaddaṃ vā sutvāva āgantukabhāvaṃ jānāti,
atk-vin02a3:61_0: Nadīādīsu nāvāya gacchantampi paratīre ṭhitampi ākāsena gacchantampi pabbatatalaaraññādīsu dūre ṭhitampi
atk-vin02a3:61_2: nāvādīhi vā gantvā mahāsaddaṃ katvā vā vegena anubandhitvā vā ārocetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:61_4: Sace vāyamantopi sampāpuṇituṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
atk-vin02a3:61_8: “visaye kira anārocentassa ratticchedo ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca hoti,
atk-vin02a3:62_1: iddhiyā gacchantāpi uposathabhāvaṃ ñatvā otaritvā uposathaṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a3:62_5: Dūtenāti ettha anupasampannaṃ pesetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:63_3: Na hi tattha vuttharattiyo gaṇanūpikā honti,
atk-vin02a3:63_5: Dasavidhantarāye pana sacepi rattiyo gaṇanūpikā na honti,
atk-vin02a3:63_9: Nānāsaṃvāsakehi saddhiṃ vinayakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:64_1: Ekacchanne āvāsetiādīsu āvāso nāma vasanatthāya katasenāsanaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:64_2: Anāvāso nāma cetiyagharaṃ bodhigharaṃ sammuñjaniaṭṭako dāruaṭṭako pānīyamāḷo vaccakuṭi dvārakoṭṭhakoti evamādi.
atk-vin02a3:64_4: Etesu yattha katthaci ekacchanne chadanato udakapatanaṭṭhānaparicchinne okāse ukkhittako vasituṃ na labhati.
atk-vin02a3:64_5: “Pārivāsiko pana antoāvāseyeva na labhatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:64_7: Kurundiyaṃ “etesu ettakesu pañcavaṇṇacchadanabaddhaṭṭhānesu pārivāsikassa ca ukkhittakassa ca pakatattena saddhiṃ udakapātena vārita”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:64_9: Sace panettha tadahupasampannepi pakatatte paṭhamaṃ pavisitvā nipanne saṭṭhivassopi pārivāsiko pacchā pavisitvā jānanto nipajjati,
atk-vin02a3:64_12: Sace pana tasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ nipanne pacchā pakatatto pavisitvā nipajjati,
atk-vin02a3:65_1: vuṭṭhāya ca “ahaṃ iminā sukhanisinno vuṭṭhāpito”ti parammukhena na gantabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:65_4: Navakena pana “mahātheraṃ obaddhaṃ karomī”ti pārivāsikattherassa santikaṃ na gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:65_5: Ekāsaneti samānavassikāsane mañce vā pīṭhe vā.
atk-vin02a3:65_6: Na chamāyaṃ nisinneti pakatatte bhūmiyaṃ nisinne itarena antamaso tiṇasanthārepi uccatare vālikātalepi vā na nisīditabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:65_7: dvādasahatthaṃ pana upacāraṃ muñcitvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:65_8: Ekacaṅkameti sahāyena viya saddhiṃ caṅkamanto ekasmiṃ caṅkame.
atk-vin02a3:66_3: akataparicchedāya bhūmiyā caṅkamante paricchedaṃ katvā vālikaṃ ākiritvā ālambanaṃ yojetvā katacaṅkame nīcepi na caṅkamitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:66_4: ko pana vādo iṭṭhakācayasampanne vedikāparikkhitteti! Sace pana pākāraparikkhitto hoti dvārakoṭṭhakayutto
atk-vin02a3:67_0: Vuḍḍhatarenāti ettha sace vuḍḍhatare pārivāsike paṭhamaṃ nipanne itaro jānanto pacchā nipajjati,
atk-vin02a3:67_1: ratticchedo cassa hoti vattabhede ca dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:67_6: Atha navakapārivāsike paṭhamaṃ nipanne vuḍḍhataro pacchā nipajjati,
atk-vin02a3:67_15: vuḍḍhatarassa ratticchedova itarassa vattabhedopīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:67_28: Sace hi dve pārivāsikā ekato vaseyyuṃ,
atk-vin02a3:67_29: te aññamaññassa ajjhācāraṃ ñatvā agāravā vā vippaṭisārino vā hutvā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ vā āpattiṃ āpajjeyyuṃ vibbhameyyuṃ vā,
atk-vin02a3:67_32: Mūlāyapaṭikassanārahādayo cettha pārivāsikānaṃ pakatattaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a3:68_2: parivāsanti ettha pārivāsikaṃ catutthaṃ katvā aññassa parivāsadānādīni kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:68_5: Gaṇe pana appahonte vattaṃ nikkhipāpetvā gaṇapūrako kātabboti.
atk-vin02a3:69_1: Imaṃ pana vattakathaṃ sutvā vinayadharaupālittherassa rahogatassa evaṃ parivitakko udapādi –
atk-vin02a3:69_3: katihi nu kho ettha kāraṇehi ratticchedo hotī”ti! So bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-vin02a3:69_8: Tattha sahavāsoti yvāyaṃ pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchannetiādinā nayena vutto ekato vāso.
atk-vin02a3:69_11: Etesu tīsu ekekena kāraṇena ratticchedo hoti.

atk-vin02a3:102_0: Pahūti yo sakkoti bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantuñceva ārocetuñca;
atk-vin02a3:102_3: Sacassa mukhe appamattako gaṇḍo vā hoti,
atk-vin02a3:102_7: tāvatakena pana neva vattuṃ na sakkoti na gantuṃ;
atk-vin02a3:102_8: apica kho na sakkomīti saññī hoti,
atk-vin02a3:102_11: Appahunā pana vattuṃ vā gantuṃ vā asamatthena pahusaññinā vā appahusaññinā vā chāditā hotu,
atk-vin02a3:103_0: Chādetukāmo ca hoti chādeti cāti idaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin02a3:103_1: Sace pana chādessāmīti dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā purebhatte vā pacchābhatte vā paṭhamayāmādīsu vā lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā antoaruṇeyeva āroceti,

atk-vin02a3:105_0: Yo pana āpannamattova aggiṃ akkantapuriso viya sahasā apakkamitvā sabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā āvi karoti,

atk-vin02a3:105_2: Sace pana sabhāgaṃ disvāpi “ayaṃ me upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā”ti lajjāya nāroceti,

atk-vin02a3:106_0: Yo pana visabhāgo hoti sutvā pakāsetukāmo,
atk-vin02a3:106_2: Tattha purebhattaṃ vā āpattiṃ āpanno hotu pacchābhattaṃ vā,

atk-vin02a3:106_6: Sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassa pana santike āvi kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:106_11: Āvikaronto ca “tuyhaṃ santike ekaṃ āpattiṃ āvikaromī”ti vā “ācikkhāmī”ti vā “ārocemī”ti vā “mama ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpannabhāvaṃ jānāhī”ti vā vadatu,
atk-vin02a3:106_13: sabbehipi ākārehi appaṭicchannāva hotīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:106_14: Sace pana lahukāpattiṃ āvikaromītiādinā nayena vadati,

atk-vin02a3:122_1: asukañca divasaṃ vā pakkhaṃ vā māsaṃ vā saṃvaccharaṃ vā tava suddhabhāvaṃ jānāsī”ti pucchiyamāno “āma,  bhante, jānāmi,

atk-vin02a3:123_21: Sambahulā pana āpajjitvā ekaṃ āpajjinti karontassa na vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a3:124_0: Yo pana yathāvuttena anulomapaṭilomanayena pucchiyamānopi rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti neva sarati vematiko vā hoti,

atk-vin02a3:124_6: Tasmā sace parivasanto rattiparicchede sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a3:124_7: māso vā saṃvaccharo vā mayhaṃ āpannassāti māsaṃ vā saṃvaccharaṃ vā parivasitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:124_8: Parivāsayācanadānalakkhaṇaṃ panettha parato pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:125_5: antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādentassa parivutthadivase odhunitvā makkhetvā purimāya āpattiyā mūladivasaparicchede
atk-vin02a3:125_6: pacchā āpannaṃ āpattiṃ samodahitvā dātabbaparivāso vuccati.

atk-vin02a3:126_1: yo paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsaṃ gahetvā parivasanto vā mānattāraho vā mānattaṃ caranto vā abbhānāraho

atk-vin02a3:126_11: Saṭṭhivassāni parivasitvā mānattāraho hutvāpi hi ekadivasaṃ antarāpattiṃ paṭicchādetvā punapi saṭṭhivassāni parivāsāraho hoti.

atk-vin02a3:138_0: Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “pakkhamānattañca samodhānamānattañca avasesaparivāsakathāvasāne kathayissāmā”ti,

atk-vin02a3:148_0: Anikkhittavattāya pana pārivāsikakkhandhake vuttanayeneva sammā vattitabbaṃ.

atk-vin02a3:148_8: Kurundiādīsu pana anikkhittavattabhikkhūnaṃ vuttanayeneva kathetabbanti vuttaṃ.

atk-vin02a3:148_13: Sace bhikkhūnaṃ tasmiṃ gāme bhikkhācāro sampajjati,

atk-vin02a3:188_3: Saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitāti ettha saratu āyasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā;
atk-vin02a3:188_7: paṭhamaṃ āpajjitvā pacchā taṃ āpattiṃ saratu āyasmāti.
atk-vin02a3:191_0: 202. Yebhuyyasikāya vūpasametunti ettha yassā kiriyāya dhammavādino bahutarā, esā yebhuyyasikā nāma.
atk-vin02a3:192_2: Na ca gatigatanti dve tayo āvāse na gataṃ,
atk-vin02a3:192_4: Na ca saritasāritanti dvattikkhattuṃ tehi bhikkhūhi sayaṃ saritaṃ vā aññehi sāritaṃ vā na hoti.
atk-vin02a3:192_6: Appeva nāmāti iminā nīhārena salākāya gāhiyamānāya “api nāma adhammavādino bahutarā assū”ti ayamassa ajjhāsayo hoti.
atk-vin02a3:193_0: Adhammena gaṇhantīti adhammavādino “evaṃ mayaṃ bahū bhavissāmā”ti dve dve salākāyo gaṇhanti.
atk-vin02a3:193_1: Vaggā gaṇhantīti dve dhammavādino ekaṃ dhammavādisalākaṃ gaṇhanti “evaṃ dhammavādino na bahū bhavissantī”ti maññamānā.
atk-vin02a3:193_2: Na ca yathādiṭṭhiyā gaṇhantīti dhammavādino hutvā “balavapakkhaṃ bhajissāmā”ti adhammavādisalākaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-vin02a3:193_4: Evaṃ salākaṃ gāhetvā sace bahutarā dhammavādino honti;
atk-vin02a3:196_4: Iti imesañca tiṇṇaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena tīṇi karaṇāni,
atk-vin02a3:196_6: dhammena samaggena karaṇanti imāni ca dveti pañca tassapāpiyasikākammassa karaṇāni nāma honti.
atk-vin02a3:199_1: Kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāyāti kakkhaḷabhāvāya ceva vāḷabhāvāya ca.
atk-vin02a3:199_3: Sabbeheva ekajjhanti kassaci chandaṃ anāharitvā gilānepi tattheva ānetvā ekato sannipatitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:199_4: Tiṇavatthārakena vūpasameyyāti ettha idaṃ kammaṃ tiṇavatthārakasadisattā “tiṇavatthārako”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:199_5: Yathā hi gūthaṃ vā muttaṃ vā ghaṭṭiyamānaṃ duggandhatāya bādhati,
atk-vin02a3:199_6: tiṇehi avattharitvā suppaṭicchāditassa panassa so gandho na bādhati;
atk-vin02a3:199_7: evameva yaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ mūlānumūlaṃ gantvā vūpasamiyamānaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvattati,
atk-vin02a3:199_8: taṃ iminā kammena vūpasantaṃ gūthaṃ viya tiṇavatthārakena paṭicchannaṃ suvūpasantaṃ hotīti idaṃ kammaṃ
atk-vin02a3:200_2: Gihipaṭisaṃyuttanti gihīnaṃ hīnena khuṃsanavambhanadhammikapaṭissavesu āpannaṃ āpattiṃ.
atk-vin02a3:201_1: Evañca pana bhikkhave te bhikkhū tāhi āpattīhi vuṭṭhitā hontīti evaṃ tiṇavatthārakakammavācāya katāya
atk-vin02a3:201_2: kammavācāpariyosāne yattakā tattha sannipatitā antamaso suttāpi samāpannāpi aññavihitāpi sabbe te bhikkhū
atk-vin02a3:201_3: yāva upasampadamaṇḍalato paṭṭhāya thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca ṭhapetvā avasesā āpattiyo āpannā,
atk-vin02a3:201_5: Ye pana “na metaṃ khamatī”ti aññamaññaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a3:201_6: tehi vā saddhiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvāpi tattha anāgatā,
atk-vin02a3:201_7: āgantvā vā chandaṃ datvā pariveṇādīsu nisinnā,
atk-vin02a3:201_10: “ṭhapetvā diṭṭhāvikammaṃ ṭhapetvā ye na tattha hontī”ti.
atk-vin02a3:204_5: Yo tattha anuvādoti yo tesu anuvadantesu upavādo.
atk-vin02a3:204_13: Anubalappadānanti purimavacanassa kāraṇaṃ dassetvā pacchimavacanena balappadānaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:205_5: Tattha apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa
atk-vin02a3:205_7: Ñattikammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā kattabbakammaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:205_8: Ñattidutiyakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā ekāya ca anussāvanāyāti
atk-vin02a3:205_10: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā tīhi ca anussāvanāhīti
atk-vin02a3:206_6: Tattha sīmāsammuti sīmāsamūhananaṃ kathinadānaṃ kathinubbhāro kuṭivatthudesanā vihāravatthudesanāti imāni cha kammāni garukāni,
atk-vin02a3:206_9: Avasesā terasa sammutiyo senāsanaggāhakamatakacīvaradānādisammutiyo cāti evarūpāni lahukakammāni apaloketvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin02a3:206_11: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ ñattiñca tisso ca kammavācāyo sāvetvāva kātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:207_0: Vitthārato pana imāni cattāri kammāni “katihākārehi vipajjantī”tiādinā nayena parivārāvasāne kammavagge etesaṃ vinicchayo āgatoyeva.
atk-vin02a3:207_3: Evañhi sati na aṭṭhāne vaṇṇanā bhavissati,
atk-vin02a3:207_4: ādito paṭṭhāya ca tassa tassa kammassa viññātattā suviññeyyo bhavissati.
atk-vin02a3:209_3: samathehi ca adhikaraṇīyatāya adhikaraṇanti evamādinā nayena attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a3:210_2: natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusalanti ettha sandhāya bhāsitavasena attho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a3:210_3: Yasmiñhi pathavikhaṇanādike āpattādhikaraṇe kusalacittaṃ aṅgaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:210_4: tasmiṃ sati na sakkā vattuṃ “natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti,
atk-vin02a3:210_11: taṃ yasmā sañcicca “imaṃ āpattiṃ vītikkamāmī”ti vītikkamantasseva akusalaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:210_12: asañcicca pana kiñci ajānantassa sahaseyyādivasena āpajjato abyākataṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:210_13: tasmā tattha sañciccāsañciccavasena imaṃ vikappabhāvaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-vin02a3:211_3: na ca tattha vijjamānampi kusalacittaṃ āpattiyā aṅgaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:211_4: Kāyavacīviññattivasena pana calitappavattānaṃ kāyavācānaṃ aññatarameva aṅgaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:212_2: tena vatthuṃ jānanto “idaṃ vītikkamāmī”ti ca vītikkamākārena saddhiṃ jānanto sañjānanto vītikkamacetanāvasena
atk-vin02a3:212_3: cetetvā pakappetvā upakkamavasena maddanto abhivitaritvā nirāsaṅkacittaṃ pesetvā yaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a3:213_0: Abyākatavārepi yaṃ cittaṃ āpattiyā aṅgaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:213_1: tassa abhāvena ajānanto vītikkamākārena ca saddhiṃ ajānanto asañjānanto āpattiaṅgabhūtāya vītikkamacetanāya
atk-vin02a3:213_2: abhāvena acetetvā sañcicca maddanassa abhāvena anabhivitaritvā nirāsaṅkacittaṃ apesetvā yaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a3:214_1: Ayaṃ vivādo no adhikaraṇantiādīsu samathehi adhikaraṇīyatāya abhāvato noadhikaraṇanti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a3:217_1: Yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattāti ettha catuvaggakaraṇe kamme cattāro,
atk-vin02a3:218_4: ajjeko palibodho atthī”ti mānaniggahatthāya katipāhaṃ atikkāmetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:219_1: Anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyantīti aparimāṇāni ito cito ca vacanāni uppajjanti.
atk-vin02a3:219_4: Ubbāhikāya sammannitabboti apaloketvā vā sammannitabbo parato vuttāya ñattidutiyāya vā kammavācāya.
atk-vin02a3:219_5: Evaṃ sammatehi pana bhikkhūhi visuṃ vā nisīditvā tassāyeva vā parisāya “aññehi asammatehi na kiñci kathetabba”nti
atk-vin02a3:220_2: Neva suttaṃ āgatanti na mātikā āgatā.
atk-vin02a3:220_4: Byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhatīti byañjanamattameva gahetvā atthaṃ paṭisedheti.
atk-vin02a3:220_5: Jātarūparajatakhettavatthupaṭiggahaṇādīsu vinayadharehi bhikkhūhi āpattiyā kāriyamāne disvā “kiṃ ime āpattiyā kāretha,
atk-vin02a3:220_6: ‘nanu jātarūparajatapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī’ti evaṃ sutte paṭiviratimattameva vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:220_8: Aparo dhammakathiko suttassa āgatattā olambetvā nivāsentānaṃ āpattiyā āropiyamānāya “kiṃ imesaṃ āpattiṃ ropetha,
atk-vin02a3:220_9: ‘nanu parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā’ti evaṃ sikkhākaraṇamattamevettha vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:221_0: 234. Yathā bahutarā bhikkhūti ettha ekenapi adhikā bahutarāva ko pana vādo dvīhi tīhīti.
atk-vin02a3:224_2: Gūḷhakantiādīsu alajjussannāya parisāya gūḷhako salākaggāho kātabbo,
atk-vin02a3:224_5: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇāyo katvāti dhammavādīnañca adhammavādīnañca salākāyo nimittasaññaṃ āropetvā aññamaññaṃ visabhāgā kātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:224_6: Tato tā sabbāpi cīvarabhoge katvā vuttanayena gāhetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:224_7: Duggahoti paccukkaḍḍhitabbanti “duggahitā salākāyo”ti vatvā puna gahetvā yāvatatiyaṃ gāhetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:224_8: Suggahoti sāvetabbanti ekasmimpi dhammavādimhi atirekajāte “suggahitā salākāyo”ti sāvetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:224_9: Yathā ca te dhammavādino vadanti tathā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbanti.
atk-vin02a3:224_12: sve jānissāmā”ti vuṭṭhahitvā alajjīnaṃ pakkhabhedatthāya dhammavādipakkhaṃ pariyesitvā punadivase salākaggāho kātabbo.
atk-vin02a3:225_0: Sakaṇṇajappake pana gahite vattabboti ettha sace saṅghatthero adhammavādisalākaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a3:225_4: ayaṃ pana dhammavādisalākā”ti assa itarā salākā dassetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:228_1: Pārājikasāmantaṃ vāti ettha methunadhamme pārājikasāmantaṃ nāma dukkaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:228_5: Sarāmi kho ahaṃ āvusoti pārājikapaṭicchādanatthāya evaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-vin02a3:228_6: Puna tena ativeṭhiyamāno “sarāmi kho”ti paṭiññaṃ datvā “idāni maṃ nāsessantī”ti bhayena “davāya me”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a3:234_1: Aṭṭāne nhāyantīti ettha aṭṭānaṃ nāma rukkhaṃ phalakaṃ viya tacchetvā aṭṭhapadākārena rājiyo chinditvā nhānatitthe nikhaṇanti,
atk-vin02a3:234_2: tattha cuṇṇāni ākiritvā manussā kāyaṃ ghaṃsanti.
atk-vin02a3:234_4: tena kira cuṇṇāni gahetvā manussā sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti.
atk-vin02a3:234_5: Kuruvindakasuttiyāti kuruvindakapāsāṇacuṇṇāni lākhāya bandhitvā kataguḷikakalāpako vuccati,
atk-vin02a3:234_6: taṃ ubhosu antesu gahetvā sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti.
atk-vin02a3:234_7: Viggayha parikammaṃ kārāpentīti aññamaññaṃ sarīrena sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti.
atk-vin02a3:234_8: Mallakaṃ nāma makaradantake chinditvā mallakamūlasaṇṭhānena kataṃ mallakanti vuccati,
atk-vin02a3:235_5: tasmā nhāyantassa yassa kassaci nhānasāṭakavaṭṭiyā piṭṭhiṃ ghaṃsituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:235_7: tasmā sabbesaṃ hatthena piṭṭhiparikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:236_3: yaṃkiñci kaṇṇapiḷandhanaṃ antamaso tālapaṇṇampi na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:236_9: akkhakānaṃ heṭṭhā bāhābharaṇaṃ yaṃkiñci ābharaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:237_1: Dumāsikaṃ vā duvaṅgulaṃ vāti ettha sace kesā antodvemāse dvaṅgulaṃ pāpuṇanti,
atk-vin02a3:237_7: tato oraṃ pana navaṭṭanabhāvo nāma natthi.
atk-vin02a3:238_2: Hatthaphaṇakenāti hattheneva phaṇakiccaṃ karontā aṅgulīhi osaṇṭhenti.
atk-vin02a3:238_6: uddhalomena pana anulomanipātanatthaṃ hatthaṃ temetvā sīsaṃ puñchitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:239_1: Na bhikkhave ādāse vā udakapatte vāti ettha kaṃsapattādīnipi yesu mukhanimittaṃ paññāyati,
atk-vin02a3:239_7: “jiṇṇo nu khomhi no”ti evaṃ āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokanatthampi vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:240_3: Manosilikāya mukhaṃ lañchentīti manosilāya tilakādīni lañchanāni karonti,
atk-vin02a3:241_1: Na bhikkhave naccaṃ vātiādīsu yaṃkiñci naccaṃ antamaso moranaccampi dassanāya gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:241_2: Sayampi naccantassa vā naccāpentassa vā dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin02a3:241_3: Gītampi yaṃkiñci naṭagītaṃ vā sādhugītaṃ vā antamaso dantagītampi “yaṃ gāyissāmā”ti pubbabhāge okūjantā karonti,
atk-vin02a3:241_7: Yaṃ pana niṭṭhubhanto vā sāsaṅke vā ṭhito accharikaṃ vā phoṭeti,
atk-vin02a3:241_14: Vīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā gīvaṃ parivattetvā passatopi āpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a3:242_2: Bhaṅgo hotīti aladdhaṃ uppādetuṃ na sakkoti;
atk-vin02a3:242_4: Pacchimā janatāti amhākaṃ ācariyāpi upajjhāyāpi evaṃ gāyiṃsūti pacchimo jano diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati;
atk-vin02a3:242_6: Na bhikkhave āyatakenāti ettha āyatako nāma taṃ taṃ vattaṃ bhinditvā akkharāni vināsetvā pavatto.
atk-vin02a3:242_10: taṃ vināsetvā atidīghaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:242_13: Sarabhaññe kira taraṅgavattadhotakavattagalitavattādīni dvattiṃsa vattāni atthi.
atk-vin02a3:242_16: Sabbesaṃ padabyañjanaṃ avināsetvā vikāraṃ akatvā samaṇasāruppena caturassena nayena pavattanaṃyeva lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:243_0: Bāhiralomiṃ uṇṇinti uṇṇalomāni bahi katvā uṇṇapāvāraṃ pārupanti;
atk-vin02a3:244_1: Na bhikkhave attano aṅgajātanti aṅgajātaṃ chindantasseva thullaccayaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:244_2: Aññaṃ pana kaṇṇanāsāaṅguliādiṃ yaṃkiñci chindantassa tādisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ uppādentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:244_3: Ahikīṭadaṭṭhādīsu pana aññaābādhapaccayā vā lohitaṃ vā mocentassa chindantassa vā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a3:245_1: Candanagaṇṭhi uppannā hotīti candanaghaṭikā uppannā hoti.
atk-vin02a3:245_2: So kira uddhañca adho ca jālāni parikkhipāpetvā gaṅgāya nadiyā kīḷati,
atk-vin02a3:245_3: tassa nadīsotena vuyhamānā candanagaṇṭhi āgantvā jāle laggā,
atk-vin02a3:246_0: Na bhikkhave sovaṇṇamayo pattotiādīsu sacepi gihī bhattagge suvaṇṇataṭṭikādīsu byañjanaṃ katvā upanāmenti,
atk-vin02a3:246_2: Phalikamayakācamayakaṃsamayāni pana taṭṭikādīni bhājanāni puggalikaparibhogeneva na vaṭṭanti,
atk-vin02a3:246_5: thālakaṃ pana vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ sabbaṃ kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:248_3: dāruādhārake dve patte uparūpari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:248_8: Bhamakoṭisadiso pana dāruādhārako tīhi daṇḍakehi baddho daṇḍakādhāro ca ekassapi pattassa anokāso,
atk-vin02a3:248_9: tattha ṭhapetvāpi hatthena gahetvā eva nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:250_1: tasmiṃ pana asati kaṭasārake vā taṭṭikāya vā mattikāparibhaṇḍakatāya bhūmiyā vā yattha na dussati,
atk-vin02a3:250_3: Paṃsurajādīsu pana kharabhūmiyaṃ vā ṭhapentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:250_4: Pattamāḷakaṃ iṭṭhakāhi vā dārūhi vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:250_6: Yo laggeyyāti yattha katthaci laggentassa dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin02a3:250_8: Bhaṇḍakaṭṭhapanatthameva vā kataṃ hotu nisīdanasayanatthaṃ vā yattha katthaci mañce vā pīṭhe vā ṭhapentassa dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:250_9: aññena pana bhaṇḍakena saddhiṃ bandhitvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:250_12: Sace pana mañco vā pīṭhaṃ vā ukkhipitvā cīvaravaṃsādīsu aṭṭakachannena ṭhapitaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:250_14: Aṃsavaddhanakena aṃsakūṭe laggetvā aṅke ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:250_15: Chatte bhattapūropi aṃsakūṭe laggitapattopi ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:250_16: bhaṇḍakena pana saddhiṃ bandhitvā vā aṭṭakaṃ katvā vā ṭhapite yo koci ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:251_1: Pattahatthenāti ettha na kevalaṃ yassa patto hatthe,
atk-vin02a3:251_3: na kevalañca kavāṭameva paṇāmetuṃ na labhati;
atk-vin02a3:251_4: apica kho pana hatthe vā piṭṭhipāde vā yattha katthaci sarīrāvayave pattasmiṃ sati hatthena vā pādena
atk-vin02a3:251_5: vā sīsena vā yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena kavāṭaṃ vā paṇāmetuṃ ghaṭikaṃ vā ukkhipituṃ sūciṃ vā kuñcikāya
atk-vin02a3:251_7: Aṃsakūṭe pana pattaṃ laggetvā yathāsukhaṃ avāpurituṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a3:252_6: Sabbapaṃsukūlikenāti ettha cīvarañca mañcapīṭhañca paṃsukūlaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:253_4: Pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ katvā hatthaṃ dhovitumpi na labhati.
atk-vin02a3:253_5: Hatthadhotapādadhotaudakampi patte ākiritvā nīharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:253_6: Anucchiṭṭhaṃ suddhapattaṃ ucchiṭṭhahatthena gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:253_7: vāmahatthena panettha udakaṃ āsiñcitvā ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvā ucchiṭṭhahatthena gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:253_9: hatthaṃ pana bahi udakena vikkhāletvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:253_10: Macchamaṃsaphalāphalādīni khādanto yaṃ tattha aṭṭhiṃ vā calakaṃ vā chaḍḍetukāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a3:253_14: Aṭṭhikakaṇṭakādīni tattheva katvā hatthena luñcitvā khādituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:253_15: Mukhato nīhaṭaṃ pana yaṃkiñci puna khāditukāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a3:254_2: Daṇḍasatthakanti pipphalakaṃ vā aññampi vā yaṃkiñci daṇḍaṃ yojetvā katasatthakaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:255_8: satthakosakasipāṭiyā pana saritasipāṭikāya anulomāti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:255_10: Kathinarajjunti yāya dupaṭṭacīvaraṃ sibbantā kathine cīvarampi bandhanti.
atk-vin02a3:255_11: Kathinaṃ nappahotīti dīghassa bhikkhuno pamāṇena kataṃ kathinaṃ;
atk-vin02a3:255_12: tattha rassassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ patthariyamānaṃ nappahoti,
atk-vin02a3:255_15: Daṇḍakathinanti tassa majjhe itarassa bhikkhuno pamāṇena aññaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:256_0: Bidalakanti daṇḍakathinappamāṇena kaṭasārakassa pariyante paṭisaṃharitvā duguṇakaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:256_2: Vinandhanarajjunti mahānisseṇiyā saddhiṃ khuddakaṃ nisseṇiṃ vinandhituṃ rajjuṃ.
atk-vin02a3:256_4: Vinandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbetunti tena suttakena tattha cīvaraṃ vinandhitvā sibbituṃ.
atk-vin02a3:256_8: Moghasuttakanti vaḍḍhakīnaṃ dārūsu kāḷasuttena viya haliddisuttena saññākaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:257_2: Uccavatthukanti paṃsuṃ ākiritvā uccavatthukaṃ kātuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:257_3: Ogumphetvā ullittāvalittaṃ kātunti chadanaṃ odhunitvā ghanadaṇḍakaṃ katvā anto ceva bahi ca mattikāya limpitunti attho.
atk-vin02a3:257_4: Goghaṃsikāyāti veḷuṃ vā rukkhadaṇḍaṃ vā antokatvā tena saddhiṃ saṅgharitunti attho.
atk-vin02a3:258_0: 258. Kaṭacchuparissāvanaṃ nāma tīsu daṇḍakesu vinandhitvā kataṃ.
atk-vin02a3:259_1: Yo na dadeyyāti aparissāvanakasseva yo na dadāti,
atk-vin02a3:259_3: Yo pana attano hatthe parissāvane vijjamānepi yācati,
atk-vin02a3:259_5: Daṇḍaparissāvananti rajakānaṃ khāraparissāvanaṃ viya catūsu pādesu baddhanisseṇikāya sāṭakaṃ bandhitvā majjhedaṇḍake udakaṃ āsiñcitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:259_7: Ottharakaṃ nāma yaṃ udake ottharitvā ghaṭakena udakaṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-vin02a3:259_8: tañhi catūsu daṇḍakesu vatthaṃ bandhitvā udake cattāro khāṇuke nikhaṇitvā tesu bandhitvā sabbapariyante
atk-vin02a3:259_9: udakato mocetvā majjhe ottharitvā ghaṭena udakaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-vin02a3:260_2: Aggaḷavaṭṭi nāma dvārabāhāya samappamāṇoyeva aggaḷatthambho vuccati,
atk-vin02a3:260_3: yattha tīṇi cattāri chiddāni katvā sūciyo denti.
atk-vin02a3:260_4: Kapisīsakaṃ nāma dvārabāhaṃ vijjhitvā tattha pavesito aggaḷapāsako vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:260_5: Sūcikāti tattha majjhe chiddaṃ katvā pavesitā.
atk-vin02a3:260_11: Tattha ghaṭena udakaṃ ṭhapetvā sarāvakena vaḷañjetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:261_1: Tisso paṭicchādiyoti ettha jantāgharapaṭicchādi ca udakapaṭicchādi ca parikammaṃ karontasseva vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:261_4: Udakaṃ na hotīti nhānodakaṃ na hoti.
atk-vin02a3:262_2: Karakaṭako vuccati goṇe vā yojetvā hatthehi vā gahetvā dīghavarattādīhi ākaḍḍhanayantaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:262_4: Cammakhaṇḍaṃ nāma tulāya vā karakaṭake vā yojetabbakaṃ cammabhājanaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:262_7: tassā asati coḷakenāpi udakaṃ paccuddharituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:263_3: gopānasīnaṃ upari maṇḍale pakkhapāsake ṭhapetvā katakūṭacchadanassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:263_4: Cātumāsaṃ nisīdanenāti nisīdanena cattāro māse na vippavasitabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a3:264_2: Namatakaṃ nāma eḷakalomehi kataṃ avāyimaṃ cammakhaṇḍaparihārena paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:264_3: Āsittakūpadhānaṃ nāma tambalohena vā rajatena vā katāya peḷāya etaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:264_7: Ādhārakasaṅkhepagamanato hi paṭṭhāya chiddaṃ viddhampi aviddhampi vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin02a3:264_8: Ekabhājaneti ettha sace eko bhikkhu bhājanato phalaṃ vā pūvaṃ vā gahetvā gacchati,
atk-vin02a3:264_9: tasmiṃ apagate itarassa sesakaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:264_10: Itarassāpi tasmiṃ khīṇe puna gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:265_1: Aṭṭhahaṅgehīti ettha ekekenapi aṅgena samannāgatassa antosīmāya vā nissīmaṃ gantvā nadīādīsu vā nikkujjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin02a3:265_2: Evaṃ nikkujjite pana patte tassa gehe koci deyyadhammo na gahetabbo –
atk-vin02a3:265_3: “asukassa gehe bhikkhaṃ mā gaṇhitthā”ti aññesu vihāresupi pesetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:265_4: Ukkujjanakāle pana yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā hatthapāsaṃ vijahāpetvā ñattidutiyakammena ukkujjitabbo.
atk-vin02a3:266_5: akkamissati me bhagavā celapaṭika”nti iminā ajjhāsayena santhari,
atk-vin02a3:266_9: pacchā puttaṃ alabhanto “nāyaṃ sabbaññū”ti diṭṭhiṃ gaṇheyya.
atk-vin02a3:266_11: Yasmā pana bhikkhūpi ye ajānantā akkameyyuṃ,
atk-vin02a3:266_13: tasmā bhikkhū paribhavato mocetuṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi.
atk-vin02a3:267_0: Maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānenāti apagatagabbhā vā hotu garugabbhā vā,
atk-vin02a3:267_1: evarūpesu ṭhānesu maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānena akkamituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:267_2: Dhotapādakaṃ nāma pādadhovanaṭṭhāne dhotehi pādehi akkamanatthāya paccattharaṇaṃ atthataṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:268_1: Katakaṃ nāma padumakaṇṇikākāraṃ pādaghaṃsanatthaṃ kaṇṭake uṭṭhāpetvā kataṃ.
atk-vin02a3:268_2: Taṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā hotu caturassādibhedaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a3:268_8: Tālavaṇṭaṃ pana tālapaṇṇehi vā kataṃ hotu veḷudantavilīvehi vā morapiñchehi vā cammavikatīhi vā sabbaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:269_1: Gilānassa chattanti ettha yassa kāyaḍāho vā pittakopo vā hoti,
atk-vin02a3:269_3: añño vā koci ābādho vinā chattena uppajjati,
atk-vin02a3:269_4: tassa gāme vā araññe vā chattaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:269_5: Vasse pana cīvaraguttatthaṃ vāḷamigacorabhayesu ca attaguttatthampi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:270_2: Daṇḍasammutinti ettha pamāṇayutto catuhatthoyeva daṇḍo sammannitvā dātabbo.
atk-vin02a3:270_3: Tato ūnātiritto vināpi sammutiyā sabbesaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:271_1: Romanthakassāti ettha ṭhapetvā romanthakaṃ sesānaṃ āgataṃ uggāraṃ mukhe sandhāretvā gilantānaṃ āpatti.
atk-vin02a3:271_2: Sace pana asandhāritameva paragalaṃ gacchati, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:272_0: Yaṃ diyyamānanti yaṃ dāyakehi diyyamānaṃ paṭiggahitabhājanato bahi patitaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:272_1: taṃ bhikkhunā sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:273_5: Malamattanti nakhato malamattaṃ apakaḍḍhituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:274_4: Golomikanti hanukamhi dīghaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ eḷakamassu vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:274_8: Āpatti dukkaṭassāti massukappāpanādīsu sabbattha āpatti dukkaṭassa.
atk-vin02a3:274_13: Na bhikkhave palitaṃ gāhāpetabbanti ettha yaṃ bhamukāya vā nalāṭe vā dāṭhikāya vā uggantvā bībhacchaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:274_14: tādisaṃ lomaṃ palitaṃ vā apalitaṃ vā gāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:276_1: Na bhikkhave akāyabandhanenāti ettha abandhitvā nikkhamantena yattha sarati,
atk-vin02a3:276_12: Paṭṭikaṃ sūkarantakanti ettha pakativītā vā macchakaṇṭakavāyimā vā paṭṭikā vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:276_16: Anujānāmi bhikkhave murajaṃ maddavīṇanti idaṃ dasāsuyeva anuññātaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:276_17: Pāmaṅgadasā cettha catunnaṃ upari na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:276_20: evaṃ sibbitā hi antā thirā honti.
atk-vin02a3:277_1: Hatthisoṇḍakaṃ nāma nābhimūlato hatthisoṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ olambakaṃ katvā nivatthaṃ coḷikaitthīnaṃ nivāsanaṃ viya.
atk-vin02a3:277_2: Macchavāḷakaṃ nāma ekato dasantaṃ ekato pāsantaṃ olambetvā nivatthaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:277_4: heṭṭhato dveti evaṃ cattāro kaṇṇe dassetvā nivatthaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:277_5: Tālavaṇṭakaṃ nāma tālavaṇṭākārena sāṭakaṃ olambetvā nivāsanaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:277_6: Satavalikaṃ nāma dīghasāṭakaṃ anekakkhattuṃ obhañjitvā ovaṭṭikaṃ karontena nivatthaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:277_7: vāmadakkhiṇapassesu vā nirantaraṃ valiyo dassetvā nivatthaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:277_8: Sace pana jāṇuto paṭṭhāya ekā vā dve vā valiyo paññāyanti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:278_0: Saṃvelliyaṃ nivāsentīti mallakammakārādayo viya kacchaṃ bandhitvā nivāsenti;
atk-vin02a3:278_1: evaṃ nivāsetuṃ gilānassapi maggappaṭipannassapi na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:278_2: Yampi maggaṃ gacchantā ekaṃ vā dve vā koṇe ukkhipitvā antaravāsakassa upari laggenti,
atk-vin02a3:278_3: anto vā ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ tathā nivāsetvā bahi aparaṃ nivāsenti,
atk-vin02a3:278_5: Gilāno pana anto kāsāvassa ovaṭṭikaṃ dassetvā aparaṃ upari nivāsetuṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a3:278_6: Agilānena dve nivāsentena saguṇaṃ katvā nivāsetabbāni.
atk-vin02a3:278_9: taṃ sabbaṃ vajjetvā nibbikāraṃ timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:278_10: Yaṃkiñci vikāraṃ karonto dukkaṭā na muccati.
atk-vin02a3:278_11: Na bhikkhave gihipārutaṃ pārupitabbanti evaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ gihipārutaṃ apārupitvā,
atk-vin02a3:278_12: ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā pārupanaṃ parimaṇḍalapārupanaṃ nāma,
atk-vin02a3:279_0: Tattha yaṃkiñci setapaṭapārutaṃ paribbājakapārutaṃ ekasāṭakapārutaṃ soṇḍapārutaṃ antepurikapārutaṃ mahājeṭṭhakapārutaṃ
atk-vin02a3:279_1: kuṭipavesakapārutaṃ brāhmaṇapārutaṃ pāḷikārakapārutanti evamādi parimaṇḍalalakkhaṇato aññathā pārutaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:279_4: yathā ca ekacce paribbājakā uraṃ vivaritvā dvīsu aṃsakūṭesu pāvuraṇaṃ ṭhapenti,
atk-vin02a3:279_5: yathā ca ekasāṭakā manussā nivatthasāṭakassa ekenantena piṭṭhiṃ pārupitvā ubho kaṇṇe ubhosu aṃsakūṭesu ṭhapenti,
atk-vin02a3:279_6: yathā ca surāsoṇḍādayo sāṭakena gīvaṃ parikkhipantā ubho ante udare vā olambenti;
atk-vin02a3:279_8: yathā ca antepurikāyo akkhitārakamattaṃ dassetvā oguṇṭhikaṃ pārupanti,
atk-vin02a3:279_9: yathā ca mahājeṭṭhā dīghasāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā tasseva ekenantena sakalasarīraṃ pārupanti,
atk-vin02a3:279_10: yathā ca kassakā khettakuṭiṃ pavisantā sāṭakaṃ paliveṭhetvā upakacchake pakkhipitvā tasseva ekenantena sarīraṃ pārupanti,
atk-vin02a3:279_11: yathā ca brāhmaṇā ubhinnaṃ upakacchakānaṃ antarena sāṭakaṃ pavesetvā aṃsakūṭesu pakkhipanti,
atk-vin02a3:279_12: yathā ca pāḷikārako bhikkhu ekaṃsapārupanena pārutaṃ vāmabāhuṃ vivaritvā cīvaraṃ aṃsakūṭaṃ āropeti;
atk-vin02a3:279_13: evaṃ apārupitvā sabbepi ete aññe ca evarūpe pārupanadose vajjetvā nibbikāraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:279_14: Tathā apārupitvā ārāme vā antaraghare vā anādarena yaṃkiñci vikāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:280_1: Muṇḍavaṭṭīti yathā rañño kuhiñci gacchato parikkhārabhaṇḍavahanamanussāti adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a3:282_3: Parittanti appaharitakaraṇena vā parikhākhaṇanena vā parittāṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:282_4: Ettha pana anupasampanne sati sayaṃ aggiṃ dātuṃ na labhati,
atk-vin02a3:282_9: senāsanaṃ pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā tathā nibbāpetuṃ labhatiyeva.
atk-vin02a3:283_3: Āpadāsūti vāḷamigādayo vā disvā maggamūḷho vā disā oloketukāmo hutvā davaḍāhaṃ vā udakoghaṃ vā āgacchantaṃ
atk-vin02a3:283_4: disvā evarūpāsu āpadāsu atiuccampi rukkhaṃ ārohituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:284_2: Chandaso āropemāti vedaṃ viya sakkatabhāsāya vācanāmaggaṃ āropema.
atk-vin02a3:284_3: Sakāya niruttiyāti ettha sakā nirutti nāma sammāsambuddhena vuttappakāro māgadhiko vohāro.
atk-vin02a3:285_5: iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti evamādiniratthakakāraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ titthiyasatthaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:287_0: 289. Ābādhappaccayāti yassa ābādhassa lasuṇaṃ bhesajjaṃ; tappaccayāti attho.
atk-vin02a3:288_1: Passāvapādukanti ettha pādukā iṭṭhakāhipi silāhipi dārūhipi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:289_1: Yathādhammo kāretabboti dukkaṭavatthumhi dukkaṭena pācittiyavatthumhi pācittiyena kāretabbo.
atk-vin02a3:289_4: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ sabbaṃ lohabhaṇḍaṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:294_8: Āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassāti āgatassa ca anāgatassa ca catūsu disāsu appaṭihatacārassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa.
atk-vin02a3:295_3: Sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyoti ettha sisiroti samphusitakavāto vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:295_5: Etāni sabbāni paṭihantīti imināva padena yojetabbāni.
atk-vin02a3:296_3: Jhāyituñca vipassitunti idampi padadvayaṃ “sukhatthañcā”ti imināva padena yojetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:296_11: idha jhāyissanti vipassissantīti dadato vihāradānaṃ saṅghassa aggaṃ buddhena vaṇṇitaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:297_2: Vāsayettha bahussuteti ettha vihāre pariyattibahussute ca paṭivedhabahussute ca vāseyya.
atk-vin02a3:297_3: Tesaṃ annañcāti yaṃ tesaṃ anucchavikaṃ annañca pānañca vatthāni ca mañcapīṭhādisenāsanāni ca,
atk-vin02a3:297_6: Tañca kho vippasannena cetasā na cittappasādaṃ virādhetvā,
atk-vin02a3:297_7: evaṃ vippasannacittassa hi te tassa dhammaṃ desenti…pe…
atk-vin02a3:298_1: Āviñchanacchiddaṃ āviñchanarajjunti ettha rajju nāma sacepi dīpinaṅguṭṭhena katā hoti,
atk-vin02a3:298_5: Yantakaṃ sūcikanti ettha yaṃ yaṃ jānāti taṃ taṃ yantakaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:298_10: Cakkalikanti ettha coḷakapādapuñchanaṃ bandhituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:298_11: Vātapānabhisīti vātapānappamāṇena bhisiṃ katvā bandhituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:299_2: Uccakampi āsandikanti vacanato ekatobhāgena dīghapīṭhameva hi aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:299_4: Sattaṅgo nāma tīsu disāsu apassayaṃ katvā katamañco,
atk-vin02a3:299_8: Eḷakapādapīṭhaṃ nāma dārupaṭṭikāya upari pāde ṭhapetvā bhojanaphalakaṃ viya katapīṭhaṃ vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:299_11: Dārumayaṃ pana sabbaṃ pīṭhaṃ vaṭṭatīti ayamettha vinicchayo.
atk-vin02a3:300_0: Aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ mañcapaṭipādakanti ettha manussānaṃ pamāṇaṅgulameva aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:300_1: Cimilikā nāma parikammakatāya bhūmiyā chavisaṃrakkhaṇatthāya attharaṇaṃ vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:300_2: Rukkhatūlanti simbalirukkhādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci rukkhānaṃ tūlaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:300_3: Latātūlanti khīravalliādīnaṃ yāsaṃ kāsañci vallīnaṃ tūlaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:300_4: Poṭakitūlanti poṭakitiṇādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci tiṇajātikānaṃ antamaso ucchunaḷādīnampi tūlaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:300_6: Rukkhavallitiṇajātiyo hi muñcitvā añño bhūtagāmo nāma natthi,
atk-vin02a3:300_7: tasmā yassa kassaci bhūtagāmassa tūlaṃ bimbohane vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:300_8: bhisiṃ pana pāpuṇitvā sabbampetaṃ akappiyatūlanti vuccati.

atk-vin02a3:343_6: bhikkhū gaṇetvā seyyā gaṇetu”nti ettha vuttanayena gāhetabbāni.
atk-vin02a3:343_7: Sace saṅghiko ca saddhādeyyo cāti dve cīvarapaccayā honti,
atk-vin02a3:343_8: tesu yaṃ bhikkhū paṭhamaṃ gaṇhituṃ icchanti,
atk-vin02a3:343_9: taṃ gāhetvā tassa ṭhitikato paṭṭhāya itaro gāhetabbo.
atk-vin02a3:344_0: Sace pana bhikkhūnaṃ appatāya pariveṇaggena senāsane gāhiyamāne ekaṃ pariveṇaṃ mahālābhaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:344_1: dasa vā dvādasa vā cīvarāni labhanti,
atk-vin02a3:344_2: taṃ vijaṭetvā aññesu alābhakesu āvāsesu pakkhipitvā aññesampi bhikkhūnaṃ gāhetabbanti mahāsumatthero āha.
atk-vin02a3:344_5: manussā hi attano āvāsajagganatthāya paccayaṃ denti,
atk-vin02a3:344_13: pariveṇaggena gāhetu”’nti tassa paṭikkosanāya aṭṭhatvā “bhante bhikkhū bahū,
atk-vin02a3:344_15: saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti taṃ saññāpetvā gāhetabbameva.
atk-vin02a3:345_0: Gāhentena ca sammatena bhikkhunā mahātherassa santikaṃ gantvā evaṃ vattabbaṃ – “bhante,
atk-vin02a3:346_0: Yopi paṃsukūliko bhikkhu senāsanaṃ gahetvā paccayaṃ vissajjeti,
atk-vin02a3:346_2: Tasmiṃyeva pariveṇe aggisālāya vā dīghasālāya vā rukkhamūle vā aññassa gāhetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:346_5: evaṃ dvīhi kāraṇehi senāsanaṃ sujaggitataraṃ bhavissati.
atk-vin02a3:346_12: vutthavassassa ca pādamūle ṭhapetvā sāṭakaṃ denti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:346_17: tesaṃ paccayaṃ avassāvāsike senāsane gāhetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:347_2: tassa samīpe rukkhe vā maṇḍape vā upanibandhitvā gāhāpetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:347_6: tasmā taṃ ekassa vā bahūnaṃ vā paricchinditvā gāhetuṃ vaṭṭatīti sabbamidaṃ vitthārena mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:348_0: Senāsanaggāhāpakena pana pāṭipadaaruṇato paṭṭhāya yāva puna aruṇaṃ na bhijjati tāva gāhetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:348_2: Sace pātova gāhite senāsane añño vitakkacāriko bhikkhu āgantvā senāsanaṃ yācati, “gahitaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin02a3:348_6: rukkhamūlādīsu yattha icchatha tattha vasathā”ti vattabbo.
atk-vin02a3:348_7: Vassūpagatehi antovasse nibaddhavattaṃ ṭhapetvā vassūpagatā bhikkhū “sammuñjaniyo bandhathā”ti vattabbā.
atk-vin02a3:348_8: Sulabhā ce daṇḍakā ceva salākāyo ca honti,
atk-vin02a3:348_12: dve tisso muṭṭhisammuñjaniyo ekā yaṭṭhisammuñjanī bandhitabbā.
atk-vin02a3:349_8: Nippapañcā hutvā samaṇadhammameva karissāmā”ti vā “sabbe terasa dhutaṅgāni samādiyantu,
atk-vin02a3:349_11: sattāhakaraṇīyena gatāpi bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ labhantū”ti vā evarūpaṃ adhammikavattaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:349_17: padhānaghare vasantānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ akatvā antovihāre nisīditvā uddisatha,
atk-vin02a3:349_24: ekopi hi kulaputto pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca labhitvā sakalasāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti,
atk-vin02a3:349_25: attano thāmena yattakāni sakkotha tattakāni dhutaṅgāni samādiyatha.
atk-vin02a3:349_26: Antovassaṃ nāmetaṃ sakaladivasaṃ rattiyā ca paṭhamapacchimayāmesu appamattehi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:349_28: Porāṇakamahātherāpi sabbapalibodhe chinditvā antovasse ekacārikavattaṃ pūrayiṃsu,
atk-vin02a3:349_29: bhasse mattaṃ jānitvā dasavatthukakathaṃ dasaasubhadasānussatiaṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇakathañca kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:349_30: āgantukānaṃ vattaṃ kātuṃ sattāhakaraṇīyena gatānaṃ apaloketvā dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti evarūpaṃ vattaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:350_2: divase divase sīlāni āvajjentā caturārakkhaṃ ahāpentā manasikārabahulā viharathā”ti.
atk-vin02a3:350_4: cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā vandantena gandhamālaṃ vā pūjentena pattaṃ vā thavikāya pakkhipantena na kathetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:350_6: “antogāme manussehi saddhiṃ paccayasaññuttakathā vā visabhāgakathā vā na kathetabbā,
atk-vin02a3:350_8: khandhakavattañca sekhiyavattañca pūretabba”nti evarūpā bahukāpi niyyānikakathā ācikkhitabbāti.
atk-vin02a3:351_0: Pacchimavassūpanāyikadivase pana sace kālaṃ ghosetvā sannipatite saṅghe koci dasahatthaṃ vatthaṃ āharitvā vassāvāsikaṃ deti,
atk-vin02a3:351_8: Sace pana pubbe gāhitaṃ muñcitvā gaṇhāti, dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:351_9: Etenevupāyena dutiyattherato paṭṭhāya parivattetvā pattaṭṭhāne āgantukassa dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:351_10: Sace paṭhamavassūpagatā dve tīṇi cattāri pañca vā vatthāni alatthuṃ,
atk-vin02a3:351_11: laddhaṃ laddhaṃ etenevupāyena vissajjāpetvā yāva āgantukassa samakaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:351_13: Tena pana samake laddhe avasiṭṭho anubhāgo therāsane dātabbo.
atk-vin02a3:351_14: Paccuppanne lābhe sati ṭhitikāya gāhetuṃ katikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:352_1: dvīsupi vassūpanāyikāsu vassūpagatā bhikkhū bhikkhāya kilamantā “āvuso,
atk-vin02a3:352_5: te tattha vasitvā pavāraṇāya āgantvā attano pattaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ gaṇhantū”ti vadanti,
atk-vin02a3:352_6: tesu ye tattha vasitvā pavāraṇāya āgacchanti,
atk-vin02a3:352_8: Sādiyantāpi hi te neva vassāvāsikassa sāmino,
atk-vin02a3:352_9: khīyantāpi ca āvāsikā neva adātuṃ labhanti.
atk-vin02a3:352_19: Pacchā tesaṃ tattha vasitvā āgatānaṃ apaloketvā dātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:352_22: “sace vassūpagatesu ekaccānaṃ vassāvāsike apāpuṇante bhikkhū katikaṃ karonti –
atk-vin02a3:352_23: ‘chinnavassānaṃ vassāvāsikañca idāni uppajjanakavassāvāsikañca imesaṃ dātuṃ ruccatī’ti evaṃ katikāya katāya gāhitasadisameva hoti,
atk-vin02a3:353_0: Temāsaṃ pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā vihāramaggacetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇāni jaggitvā bodhirukkhe udakaṃ siñcitvā
atk-vin02a3:353_3: Saṅghikaṃ pana apalokanakammaṃ katvā gāhitaṃ antovasse vibbhantopi labhateva.
atk-vin02a3:353_4: Paccayavasena gāhitaṃ pana na labhatīti vadanti.
atk-vin02a3:354_0: Sace vutthavasso disaṃgamiko bhikkhu āvāsikassa hatthato kiñcideva kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā “asukakule mayhaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:354_3: Sace pana manusse sammukhā sampaṭicchāpetvā gacchati, labhati.
atk-vin02a3:354_4: “Idaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ amhākaṃ senāsane vutthabhikkhuno demā”ti vutte,
atk-vin02a3:354_6: Sace pana senāsanasāmikassa piyakamyatāya puttadhītādayo bahūni vatthāni āharitvā “amhākaṃ senāsane demā”ti denti,
atk-vin02a3:354_11: Senāsane vassūpagataṃ bhikkhuṃ nissāya uppannena cittappasādena bahūni vatthāni āharitvā “senāsanassa demā”ti dinnesupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a3:354_12: Sace pana pādamūle ṭhapetvā “etassa bhikkhuno demā”ti vadanti,
atk-vin02a3:355_4: ekaṃ aṭṭhahatthaṃ sāṭakaṃ peseti “vassāvāsikaṃ pattabhikkhūnaṃ dethā”ti vicinitvā varabhāgaṃ sāmaṇerassa datvā anubhāgo therāsane dātabbo.
atk-vin02a3:355_5: Sace pana ubhopi gharaṃ netvā bhojetvā sayameva pādamūle ṭhapeti,
atk-vin02a3:356_4: ‘sāmaṇerassā’ti avatvā ‘dānakāle jānissasī’ti vatvā dānadivase ekaṃ mahātheraṃ pesetvā nīharāpetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:356_6: so vibbhamati vā kālaṃ vā karoti,
atk-vin02a3:356_13: Atha saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā denti,
atk-vin02a3:356_16: ānetvā dinnaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ senāsanaparikkhāraṃ vā katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:359_2: tattha tayā moghapurisa gahitaṃ idha muttaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:359_3: idha tayā gahitaṃ tatra muttanti ettha ayamattho –
atk-vin02a3:359_5: taṃ te gaṇhanteneva idha muttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:359_7: muñcāmī”ti vadantena pana taṃ tatrāpi muttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:360_5: Idhekacco vassūpanāyikadivase ekasmiṃ vihāre senāsanaṃ gahetvā sāmantavihāraṃ gantvā tatrāpi gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a3:360_6: tassa iminā gahaṇena purimaṃ gahaṇaṃ paṭippassambhati.
atk-vin02a3:360_7: Aparo “idha vasissāmī”ti ālayamattaṃ katvā sāmantavihāraṃ gantvā tattha senāsanaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a3:360_8: tassa iminā gahaṇena purimo ālayo paṭippassambhati.
atk-vin02a3:360_9: Eko “idha vasissāmī”ti senāsanaṃ vā gahetvā ālayaṃ vā katvā sāmantavihāraṃ gantvā “idheva dāni vasissāmī”ti ālayaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a3:360_10: iccassa ālayena vā gahaṇaṃ ālayena vā ālayo paṭippassambhati,
atk-vin02a3:360_11: sabbattha pacchime gahaṇe vā ālaye vā tiṭṭhati.
atk-vin02a3:360_12: Yo pana “ekasmiṃ vihāre senāsanaṃ gahetvā aññasmiṃ vihāre vasissāmī”ti gacchati,
atk-vin02a3:360_16: āgamissāmī”ti gantvā aphāsubhāvaṃ ñatvā paccāgacchati, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:361_1: Tivassantarenāti ettha tivassantaro nāma yo dvīhi vassehi mahantataro vā daharataro vā hoti.
atk-vin02a3:361_2: Yo pana ekena vassena mahantataro vā daharataro vā hoti,
atk-vin02a3:361_5: Ime sabbe ekasmiṃ mañce vā pīṭhe vā dve dve hutvā nisīdituṃ labhanti.
atk-vin02a3:361_7: taṃ saṃhārimaṃ vā hotu asaṃhārimaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a3:361_8: tathārūpe api phalakakhaṇḍe anupasampannenāpi saddhiṃ nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:362_2: Sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoganti suvaṇṇarajatādivicitrāni kavāṭāni mañcapīṭhāni tālavaṇṭāni suvaṇṇarajatamayapānīyaghaṭapānīyasarāvāni
atk-vin02a3:362_8: Gonakādīni saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vā mañcapīṭhakesu attharitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin02a3:365_3: Tattha ārāmo nāma pupphārāmo vā phalārāmo vā.
atk-vin02a3:365_4: Ārāmavatthu nāma tesaṃyeva ārāmānaṃ atthāya paricchinditvā ṭhapitokāso;
atk-vin02a3:365_5: tesu vā ārāmesu vinaṭṭhesu tesaṃ porāṇakabhūmibhāgo.
atk-vin02a3:365_10: kuḷīrapādako āhaccapādakoti imesaṃ pubbe vuttānaṃ catunnaṃ mañcānaṃ aññataro.
atk-vin02a3:365_11: Pīṭhaṃ nāma masārakādīnaṃyeva catunnaṃ pīṭhānaṃ aññataraṃ.
atk-vin02a3:365_14: Lohakumbhī nāma kāḷalohena vā tambalohena vā yena kenaci lohena katā kumbhī.
atk-vin02a3:365_19: Vāsiādīsu valliādīsu ca duviññeyyaṃ nāma natthi. Evaṃ –
atk-vin02a3:374_1: Tasmā mūlacchejjavasena avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgiyañca parivattanavasena pana vissajjentassa paribhuñjantassa
atk-vin02a3:375_1: idaṃ tāva pañcavidhampi cīvarapiṇḍapātabhesajjatthāya upanetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:375_2: Thāvarena ca thāvaraṃ garubhaṇḍena ca garubhaṇḍaṃ parivattetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:375_3: Thāvare pana khettaṃ vatthu taḷākaṃ mātikāti evarūpaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa vicāretuṃ vā sampaṭicchituṃ vā adhivāsetuṃ vā na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:375_5: Ārāmena pana ārāmaṃ ārāmavatthuṃ vihāraṃ vihāravatthunti imāni cattāri parivattetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:376_5: Aññesaṃ pana tassa ārāmassa avidūragāmavāsīnaṃ manussānaṃ vihārassa samīpe ārāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a3:376_6: te saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sakena ārāmena taṃ ārāmaṃ yācanti,
atk-vin02a3:376_12: atha kho itarato bahutaraṃ āyaṃ deti.
atk-vin02a3:376_15: Sace pana manussānaṃ bahutarā rukkhā honti,
atk-vin02a3:376_21: manussānaṃ rukkhā na tāva phalaṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-vin02a3:376_31: Eteneva nayena ārāmavatthupi vihāropi vihāravatthupi ārāmena parivattetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:376_32: Ārāmavatthunā ca mahantena vā khuddakena vā ārāmaārāmavatthu vihāravihāravatthūni.
atk-vin02a3:377_4: sace manussā tena pāsādena taṃ gehaṃ yācanti,
atk-vin02a3:377_17: Eteneva nayena vihāravatthupi ārāmopi ārāmavatthupi vihārena parivattetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:377_18: Vihāravatthunā ca mahagghena vā appagghena vā vihāravihāravatthuārāmaārāmavatthūni.
atk-vin02a3:378_0: Garubhaṇḍena garubhaṇḍaparivattane pana mañcapīṭhaṃ mahantaṃ vā hotu khuddakaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a3:378_1: antamaso caturaṅgulapādakaṃ vā gāmadārakehi paṃsvāgārakesu kīḷantehi katampi saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:378_2: Sacepi rājarājamahāmattādayo ekappahāreneva mañcasataṃ vā mañcasahassaṃ vā denti,
atk-vin02a3:378_6: Atirekamañce bhaṇḍāgārādīsu paññapetvā pattacīvaraṃ nikkhipitumpi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:378_7: Bahisīmāya “saṅghassa demā”ti dinnamañco saṅghattherassa vasanaṭṭhāne dātabbo.
atk-vin02a3:378_12: Mahagghena satagghanakena vā sahassagghanakena vā satasahassagghanakena vā mañcena aññaṃ mañcasataṃ labhati,
atk-vin02a3:378_20: Akappiyaṃ vā mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vā parivattetvā vuttavatthūni gahetabbāni.
atk-vin02a3:379_0: Lohakumbhī lohabhāṇakaṃ lohakaṭāhanti imāni tīṇi mahantāni vā hontu khuddakāni vā antamaso pasatamattaudakagaṇhanakānipi garubhaṇḍāniyeva.
atk-vin02a3:379_1: Lohavārako pana kāḷalohatambalohavaṭṭalohakaṃsalohānaṃ yena kenaci kato sīhaḷadīpe pādagaṇhanako bhājetabbo.
atk-vin02a3:379_2: Pādo ca nāma magadhanāḷiyā pañcanāḷimattaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a3:380_1: khuddakāni vā mahantāni vā sabbāni garubhaṇḍāni. Patto,
atk-vin02a3:380_4: Kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohabhājanavikati saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭā vā vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:380_6: Kaṃsalohādibhājanaṃ saṅghassa dinnampi hi pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:381_0: Ṭhapetvā pana bhājanavikatiṃ aññasmimpi kappiyalohabhaṇḍe – añjanī,
atk-vin02a3:381_15: antamaso lohakhilakaṃ upādāya sabbāni lohabhaṇḍāni garubhaṇḍāniyeva honti,
atk-vin02a3:381_16: attanā laddhānipi pariharitvā puggalikaparibhogena na paribhuñjitabbāni,
atk-vin02a3:382_0: Ghaṭako pana telabhājanaṃ vā pādagaṇhanakato atirekameva garubhaṇḍaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:382_3: Senāsanaparibhoge pana āmāsampi anāmāsampi sabbaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:383_0: Vāsiādīsu yāya vāsiyā ṭhapetvā daṇḍakaṭṭhacchedanaṃ vā ucchutacchanaṃ vā aññaṃ mahākammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-vin02a3:383_2: Tato mahattarī yena kenaci ākārena katā vāsi garubhaṇḍameva.
atk-vin02a3:383_3: Pharasu pana antamaso vejjānaṃ sirāvedhanapharasupi garubhaṇḍameva.
atk-vin02a3:383_8: Nikhādanaṃ caturassamukhaṃ vā hotu doṇimukhaṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā ujukaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a3:383_15: Yehi manussehi vihāre vāsiādīni dinnāni honti,
atk-vin02a3:383_16: te ca ghare daḍḍhe vā corehi vā vilutte “detha no, bhante,
atk-vin02a3:384_7: Nahāpitatunnakāraupakaraṇesupi ṭhapetvā mahākattariṃ mahāsaṇḍāsaṃ mahāpipphalakañca sabbaṃ bhājanīyaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:385_0: Valliādīsu vettavalliādikā yā kāci aḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā valli saṅghassa dinnā vā tatthajātakā vā rakkhitagopitā garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:385_1: sā saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate sace atirekā hoti,
atk-vin02a3:385_4: Suttamakacivākanāḷikerahīracammamayā rajjukā vā yottāni vā vāke ca nāḷikerahīre ca vaṭṭetvā katā ekavaṭṭā
atk-vin02a3:385_5: vā dvivaṭṭā vā saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:385_6: Suttaṃ pana avaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ makacivākanāḷikerahīrā ca bhājanīyā.
atk-vin02a3:385_8: te attano karaṇīyena harantā na vāretabbā.
atk-vin02a3:386_0: Yo koci antamaso aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattopi veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako vā rakkhitagopito garubhaṇḍaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:386_1: sopi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atireko puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:386_7: Rakkhitagopitaṃ veḷuṃ gaṇhantena samakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā thāvaraṃ antamaso taṃagghanakampi phātikammaṃ katvā gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a3:387_0: Tiṇanti muñjaṃ pabbajañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ yaṃkiñci tiṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:387_4: Iti muñjādīsu yaṃkiñci muṭṭhippamāṇampi tiṇaṃ tālapaṇṇādīsu ca ekaṃ paṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:387_5: vā bahārāme saṅghassa tiṇavatthuto jātatiṇaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:387_6: tampi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:388_0: Mattikā pakatimattikā vā hotu pañcavaṇṇā vā sudhā vā sajjurasakaṅguṭṭhasilesādīsu vā yaṃkiñci,
atk-vin02a3:388_1: dullabhaṭṭhāne ānetvā vā dinnaṃ tatthajātakaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ tālaphalapakkamattaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:388_2: Tampi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca niṭṭhite atirekaṃ puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:389_0: Dārubhaṇḍe yo koci aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattopi dārubhaṇḍako dārudullabhaṭṭhāne saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako vā rakkhitagopito,
atk-vin02a3:389_2: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sabbampi dāruveḷucammapāsāṇādivikatiṃ dārubhaṇḍena saṅgaṇhitvā “tena kho pana
atk-vin02a3:389_3: samayena saṅghassa āsandiko uppanno hotī”ti ito paṭṭhāya dārubhaṇḍavinicchayo vutto.
atk-vin02a3:390_4: palālapīṭhakanti imesu tāva yaṃkiñci khuddakaṃ vā hotu mahantaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a3:391_9: dārumayo vā dantamayo vā veḷumayo vā sapādakopi apādakopi samuggo, mañjūsā,
atk-vin02a3:391_14: pānīyasaṅkhoti etesupi yaṃkiñci saṅghe dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:392_0: Pādakathalikamaṇḍalaṃ dārumayaṃ vā hotu coḷapaṇṇādimayaṃ vā sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:392_4: yaṭṭhisammuñjanī muṭṭhisammuñjanīti etesupi yaṃkiñci khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā dāruveḷupaṇṇacammādīsu yena kenaci kataṃ garubhaṇḍameva.
atk-vin02a3:393_0: Thambhatulāsopānaphalakādīsu dārumayaṃ vā pāsāṇamayaṃ vā yaṃkiñci gehasambhārarūpaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:393_9: Kurundiyaṃ pana “sabbaṃ mañcappamāṇaṃ cammaṃ garubhaṇḍa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:394_11: vāsipharasuādīnaṃ daṇḍāti etesu yaṃkiñci vippakatatacchanakammaṃ aniṭṭhitameva bhājanīyaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:394_13: Anuññātavāsiyā pana daṇḍo chattamuṭṭhipaṇṇaṃ kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanā araṇisahitaṃ dhammakaraṇo pādagaṇhanakato
atk-vin02a3:394_14: anatirittaṃ āmalakatumbaṃ āmalakaghaṭo lābukatumbaṃ lābughaṭo visāṇakatumbanti sabbametaṃ bhājanīyaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:395_0: Hatthidanto vā yaṃkiñci visāṇaṃ vā atacchitaṃ yathājātameva bhājanīyaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:395_2: Tacchitaniṭṭhitopi hiṅgukaraṇḍako añjanakaraṇḍako gaṇṭhikā vidho añjanī añjanisalākā udakapuñchanīti idaṃ sabbaṃ bhājanīyameva.
atk-vin02a3:396_0: Mattikābhaṇḍe sabbaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ghaṭapiṭharādikulālabhājanaṃ pattakaṭāhaṃ aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:396_1: dhūmadānakaṃ dīparukkhako dīpakapallikā cayaniṭṭhakā chadaniṭṭhakā thūpikāti saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a3:396_3: pādagaṇhanakato anatirittappamāṇo pana ghaṭako pattaṃ thālakaṃ kañcanako kuṇḍikāti idamettha bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:396_5: evaṃ lohabhaṇḍepi kuṇḍikā bhājanīyakoṭṭhāsameva bhajatīti ayamettha anupubbikathā.
atk-vin02a3:399_3: Dhūmakālikanti idaṃ yāvassa citakadhūmo na paññāyati,
atk-vin02a3:399_4: tāva ayaṃ vihāro etassevāti evaṃ dhūmakāle apaloketvā katapariyositaṃ vihāraṃ denti.
atk-vin02a3:399_5: Vippakatanti ettha vippakato nāma yāva gopānasiyo na ārohanti.
atk-vin02a3:399_6: Gopānasīsu pana āruḷhāsu bahukato nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a3:399_9: Khuddake vihāre kammaṃ oloketvā chappañcavassikanti kammaṃ oloketvā catuhatthavihāre catuvassikaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:399_14: Sace pana so navahattho hoti navavassikampi dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:399_15: Mahallake pana dasahatthe ekādasahatthe vihāre vā pāsāde vā dasavassikaṃ vā ekādasavassikaṃ vā dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:399_16: Dvādasahatthe pana tato adhike vā lohapāsādasadisepi dvādasavassikameva dātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:400_0: Navakammiko bhikkhu antovasse taṃ āvāsaṃ labhati,
atk-vin02a3:400_3: āvāsasāmikassa vā tassa vaṃse uppannassa vā kassaci kathetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a3:400_7: bhikkhūhi ñātī vā upaṭṭhāke vā samādapetvā jaggitabbo.
atk-vin02a3:400_10: Tasmimpi asati ekaṃ āvāsaṃ vissajjetvā avasesā jaggitabbā.
atk-vin02a3:401_0: Dubbhikkhe bhikkhūsu pakkantesu sabbe āvāsā nassanti,
atk-vin02a3:401_1: tasmā ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā āvāse vissajjetvā tato yāgubhattacīvarādīni paribhuñjantehi sesāvāsā jaggitabbāyeva.
atk-vin02a3:401_2: Kurundiyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “saṅghike paccaye asati eko bhikkhu ‘tuyhaṃ ekaṃ mañcaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā jaggāhī’ti vattabbo.
atk-vin02a3:401_4: tibhāgaṃ vā upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ vā datvāpi jaggāpetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:401_8: evampi hi saṅghassa bhaṇḍakaṭṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ navakānañca vasanaṭṭhānaṃ labhissatī’ti jaggāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a3:401_9: Evaṃ jaggito pana tasmiṃ jīvante puggaliko hoti,
atk-vin02a3:401_12: kammaṃ oloketvā tibhāgaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṃ vā puggalikaṃ katvā jaggāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a3:401_14: Evaṃ jagganake pana asati ‘ekaṃ āvāsaṃ vissajjetvā’tiādinā nayena jaggāpetabbo”ti.
atk-vin02a3:402_1: dve bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ bhūmiṃ gahetvā sodhetvā saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ karonti.
atk-vin02a3:402_2: Yena sā bhūmi paṭhamaṃ gahitā, so sāmī.
atk-vin02a3:402_9: Aññasmiṃ pana tādise paṭirūpe ṭhāne asati taṃ paṭibāhitvā saṅghikaṃ karonteneva kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:402_10: Yaṃ pana tassa tattha vayakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-vin02a3:402_12: Sace pana katāvāse vā āvāsakaraṇaṭṭhāne vā chāyūpagaphalūpagarukkhā honti,
atk-vin02a3:403_0: Yo pana saṅghikavallimattampi aggahetvā āharimena upakaraṇena saṅghikāya bhūmiyā puggalikavihāraṃ kāreti,
atk-vin02a3:403_8: Atha heṭṭhā ca upari ca icchati,
atk-vin02a3:403_15: Sace akataṭṭhāne cayaṃ vā pamukhaṃ vā karoti,
atk-vin02a3:403_18: Atha mahantaṃ visamaṃ pūretvā apade padaṃ dassetvā kataṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:404_0: Ekaṃ varaseyyanti ettha navakammadānaṭṭhāne vā vassaggena pattaṭṭhāne vā yaṃ icchati,
atk-vin02a3:405_0: Pariyosite pakkamati tassevetanti puna āgantvā vasantassa antovassaṃ tasseva taṃ;
atk-vin02a3:405_1: anāgacchantassa pana saddhivihārikādayo gahetuṃ na labhanti.
atk-vin02a3:408_5: Tasmā taṃ aññatra haritvā saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ sunaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:408_7: Sace arogaṃ tasmiṃ vihāre paṭisaṅkhate puna pākatikaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:408_8: Puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjato naṭṭhaṃ vā jiṇṇaṃ vā gīvā hoti,
atk-vin02a3:408_10: Sace tato gopānasiādīni gahetvā aññasmiṃ saṅghikāvāse yojenti,
atk-vin02a3:408_12: Puggalikāvāse yojentehi pana mūlaṃ vā dātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:408_13: paṭipākatikaṃ vā kātabbaṃ chaḍḍitavihārato mañcapīṭhādīni theyyacittena gaṇhanto uddhāreyeva bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo.
atk-vin02a3:408_14: Puna āvāsikakāle dassāmīti gahetvā saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ sunaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:408_18: Tato dvāravātapānādīni saṅghikāvāse vā puggalikāvāse vā yojitāni paṭidātabbāniyeva.
atk-vin02a3:409_1: Phātikammañcettha samakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā agghanakaṃ mañcapīṭhādisenāsanameva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:410_1: Allehi pādehīti yehi akkantaṭṭhāne udakaṃ paññāyati,
atk-vin02a3:410_2: evarūpehi pādehi paribhaṇḍakatabhūmi vā senāsanaṃ vā na akkamitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:411_0: Coḷakena paliveṭhetunti sudhābhūmiyaṃ vā paribhaṇḍabhūmiyaṃ vā sace taṭṭikā vā kaṭasārako vā natthi,
atk-vin02a3:411_4: Yadi pana tattha nevāsikā anatthatāyapi bhūmiyā ṭhapenti,
atk-vin02a3:412_0: Na bhikkhave parikammakatā bhittīti setabhitti vā cittakammakatā vā.
atk-vin02a3:412_2: dvārampi vātapānampi apassenaphalakampi pāsāṇatthambhampi rukkhatthambhampi cīvarena vā kenaci vā appaṭicchādetvā apassayituṃ na labbhatiyeva.
atk-vin02a3:413_0: Dhotapādakāti dhotapādakā hutvā dhotehi pādehi akkamitabbaṭṭhāne nipajjituṃ kukkuccāyanti.
atk-vin02a3:413_3: Paccattharitvāti paribhaṇḍakataṃ bhūmiṃ vā bhūmattharaṇasenāsanaṃ vā saṅghikamañcapīṭhaṃ vā attano santakena
atk-vin02a3:413_5: Sace niddāyatopi paccattharaṇe saṅkuṭite koci sarīrāvayavo mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā phusati,
atk-vin02a3:413_9: Hatthatalapādatalehi pana phusituṃ vā akkamituṃ vā vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:416_1: Na sakkonti saṅghabhattaṃ kātunti sakalassa saṅghassa bhattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-vin02a3:416_3: dasa vā bhikkhū saṅghato uddisitvā dethā”ti evaṃ uddesena laddhabhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ kātuṃ icchanti.
atk-vin02a3:416_4: Apare tatheva bhikkhū paricchinditvā nimantetvā tesaṃ bhattaṃ kātuṃ icchanti.
atk-vin02a3:416_6: apare pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikanti evaṃ niyāmetvā,
atk-vin02a3:416_8: dasannaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ kātuṃ icchanti.
atk-vin02a3:416_9: Iti etāni bhattāni uddesabhattaṃ nimantananti imaṃ vohāraṃ pattāni.
atk-vin02a3:416_10: Yasmā pana te sacepi dubbhikkhe na sakkonti,
atk-vin02a3:416_11: subhikkhe jāte pana puna saṅghabhattaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissanti,
atk-vin02a3:417_1: tasmā “amhākaṃ ajja dasa dvādasa divasā bhuñjantānaṃ idāni aññato bhikkhū ānethā”ti na evaṃ tattha vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:417_3: idāni taṃ amhākaṃ gāhethā”ti evampi vattuṃ na labbhati.
atk-vin02a3:420_1: raññā vā rājamahāmattena vā saṅghato uddisitvā “ettake bhikkhū ānethā”ti pahite kālaṃ ghosetvā ṭhitikā pucchitabbā.
atk-vin02a3:420_6: Te pana dhutaṅgaṃ rakkhantā sayameva atikkamissanti;
atk-vin02a3:420_7: evaṃ gāhiyamāne alasajātikā mahātherā pacchā āgacchanti, “bhante,
atk-vin02a3:420_10: ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ gāhetvā pacchā ṭhitikāya gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:420_11: “Asukavihāre bahuṃ uddesabhattaṃ uppanna”nti sutvā yojanantarikavihāratopi bhikkhū āgacchanti,
atk-vin02a3:420_13: Asampattānampi upacārasīmaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ antevāsikādīsu gaṇhantesu gāhetabbameva.
atk-vin02a3:420_16: Sace pana upacārasīmaṃ okkantehi ekābaddhā hutvā attano vihāradvāre vā antovihāreyeva vā honti,
atk-vin02a3:420_20: Dutiyabhāge pana therāsanaṃ āruḷhe puna āgatānaṃ paṭhamabhāgo na pāpuṇāti,
atk-vin02a3:421_0: Ekasmiṃ vihāre ekaṃ bhattuddesaṭṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā gāvutappamāṇāyapi upacārasīmāya yattha katthaci ārocitaṃ uddesabhattaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:421_2: Eko ekassa bhikkhuno pahiṇāti “svepi saṅghato uddisitvā dasa bhikkhū pahiṇathā”ti,
atk-vin02a3:421_10: Sacepi upacārasīmaṃ atikkantā bhikkhū ca upacārasīmaṭṭhakehi ekābaddhā honti,
atk-vin02a3:421_13: Bhikkhūnaṃ pana tādise ekābaddhe asati bahiupacārasīmāya yasmiṃ ṭhāne sarati,
atk-vin02a3:421_15: Antogāme āsanasālāya sarantena āsanasālāya ṭhitikāya gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:422_0: Sace sakavihārato aññaṃ vihāraṃ gacchante bhikkhū disvā koci uddesabhattaṃ uddisāpeti,
atk-vin02a3:422_1: yāva antoupacāre vā upacārasīmaṭṭhakehi saddhiṃ vuttanayena ekābaddhā vā honti,
atk-vin02a3:422_3: Bahiupacāre ṭhitānaṃ dinnaṃ pana “saṅghato bhante ettake nāma bhikkhū uddisathā”ti vutte sampattānaṃ gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:422_4: Tattha dvādasahatthantaraṃ avijahitvā ekābaddhanayena dūre ṭhitāpi sampattāyevāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:422_8: Sacepi gāmadvāre vā vīthiyaṃ vā catukke vā antaraghare vā bhikkhū disvā koci saṅghuddesaṃ āroceti,
atk-vin02a3:423_4: Tattha yaṃ ekakulassa gharaṃ ekavaḷañjaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:423_6: Tatthuppanno uddesalābho tasmiṃ upacāre bhikkhācāravattenapi ṭhitānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-vin02a3:424_0: Yaṃ pana ekaṃ gharaṃ dvinnaṃ bhariyānaṃ sukhavihāratthāya majjhe bhittiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā nānādvāravaḷañjaṃ kataṃ,
atk-vin02a3:425_0: Yasmiṃ pana ghare bahū bhikkhū nimantetvā antogehato paṭṭhāya ekābaddhe katvā paṭivissakagharānipi pūretvā nisīdāpenti,
atk-vin02a3:425_2: Yampi nānākulassa nivesanaṃ majjhe bhittiṃ akatvā ekadvāreneva vaḷañjanti,
atk-vin02a3:426_0: Yo pana nānānivesanesu nisinnānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddesalābho uppajjati,
atk-vin02a3:427_0: Yo pana gāmadvāravīthicatukkesu aññatarasmiṃ ṭhāne uddesabhattaṃ labhitvā aññasmiṃ bhikkhusmiṃ asati
atk-vin02a3:427_1: attanova pāpuṇāpetvā dutiyadivasepi tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne aññaṃ labhati,
atk-vin02a3:427_2: tena yaṃ aññaṃ navakaṃ vā vuḍḍhaṃ vā bhikkhuṃ passati,
atk-vin02a3:428_0: Sace āsanasālāya nisīditvā kālaṃ paṭimānentesu bhikkhūsu koci āgantvā “saṅghuddesapattaṃ detha,
atk-vin02a3:428_7: saṅghikaṃ bhikkhuṃ dethā”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a3:429_0: Uddesako panettha pesalo lajjī medhāvī icchitabbo,
atk-vin02a3:429_1: tena tikkhattuṃ ṭhitikaṃ pucchitvā sace koci ṭhitikaṃ jānanto natthi,
atk-vin02a3:429_7: Sace tassa sutvā “dasavassamha dasavassamhā”ti bahū āgacchanti,
atk-vin02a3:429_9: tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti avatvā “sabbe appasaddā hothā”ti vatvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:429_13: tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti avatvā sabbanavakassa vassaggañca utu ca divasabhāgo ca chāyā ca pucchitabbā.
atk-vin02a3:429_14: Sace chāyāyapi pucchiyamānāya añño vuḍḍhataro āgacchati,
atk-vin02a3:429_16: Atha chāyaṃ pucchitvā “tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vutte vuḍḍhataro āgacchati,
atk-vin02a3:429_18: Kathāpapañcena hi nisinnassāpi niddāyantassāpi gāhitaṃ suggāhitaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:430_0: Koci āsanasālato aṭṭha uddesapatte āharāpetvā satta patte paṇītabhojanānaṃ ekaṃ udakassa pūretvā āsanasālāyaṃ pahiṇāti,
atk-vin02a3:430_1: gahetvā āgatā kiñci avatvā bhikkhūnaṃ hatthesu patiṭṭhāpetvā pakkamanti.
atk-vin02a3:430_5: tassa atikkantampi ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ uddesabhattaṃ gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:430_6: Tañca lūkhaṃ vā labhatu paṇītaṃ vā ticīvaraparivāraṃ vā,
atk-vin02a3:430_9: Udakaṃ pana yasmā āmisaṃ na hoti,
atk-vin02a3:431_0: Sace pana te gahetvā āgatā “idaṃ kira bhante sabbaṃ bhājetvā bhuñjathā”ti vatvā gacchanti,
atk-vin02a3:431_9: ṭhitikāya pana tesaṃ na pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā ṭhitikāvaseneva dātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:431_10: Daharasāmaṇerehi pana uddesabhattesu laddhesu sace dāyakānaṃ ghare maṅgalaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:432_0: Yasmiṃ pana uddesabhatte paṭhamabhāgo sāmaṇerānaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-vin02a3:432_2: na tattha sāmaṇerā “mayaṃ paṭhamabhāgaṃ labhimhā”ti purato gantuṃ labhanti,
atk-vin02a3:432_5: ṭhitikā pana evaṃ gacchatī”’ti ṭhitikāvaseneva gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:432_6: Atha “saṅghuddesapattaṃ dethā”ti vatvā agāhiteyeva patte yassa kassaci pattaṃ gahetvā pūretvā āharati,
