atk-vin02a3:529_0: Suttantapariyāyena rāgavinayo dosavinayo mohavinayo saṃvaro pahānaṃ paṭisaṅkhāti ayaṃ vinayo nāma,
atk-vin02a3:529_1: rāgādīnaṃ avinayo asaṃvaro appahānaṃ appaṭisaṅkhāti ayaṃ avinayo nāma.
atk-vin02a3:529_2: Vinayapariyāyena vatthusampatti ñattisampatti anussāvanasampatti sīmāsampatti parisāsampattīti ayaṃ vinayo nāma,
atk-vin02a3:530_1: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti idaṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena;
atk-vin02a3:530_8: navaṅgiko maggoti idaṃ abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena.
atk-vin02a3:530_12: tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyāti idaṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena;
atk-vin02a3:530_16: ekattiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyāti idaṃ abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena.
atk-vin02a3:531_7: Vinayapariyāyena nimantitassa vassāvāsaṃ vasitvā apaloketvā cāriyapakkamanaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:531_9: āgantukehi saddhiṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭisanthārakaraṇanti idaṃ āciṇṇaṃ;
atk-vin02a3:532_5: tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyāti idaṃ paññattaṃ nāma;
atk-vin02a3:532_7: ekattiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyāti idaṃ apaññattaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a3:533_4: na mocanādhippāyassā”ti tattha tattha vuttā anāpatti anāpatti nāma.
atk-vin02a3:533_6: theyyacittassā”tiādinā nayena vuttā āpatti āpatti nāma.
atk-vin02a3:534_0: Purimanayeneva panettha vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ “adhammo aya”nti kathayantā “dhammaṃ adhammo”ti dīpenti nāma.
atk-vin02a3:534_2: aduṭṭhullāpattiṃ “duṭṭhullāpatti aya”nti kathayantā “aduṭṭhullāpattiṃ duṭṭhullāpattī”ti dīpenti nāma.
atk-vin02a3:534_4: “aduṭṭhullāpattiṃ duṭṭhullāpattī”ti vā dīpetvā pakkhaṃ labhitvā catunnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ aññataraṃ saṅghakammaṃ
atk-vin02a3:534_5: ekasīmāyaṃ visuṃ karontehi saṅgho bhinno nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a3:535_3: Avapakāsantīti ati viya pakāsenti yathā visaṃsaṭṭhāva honti,
atk-vin02a3:535_6: Ettāvatā kho upāli saṅgho bhinno hotīti evaṃ aṭṭhārasasu bhedakaravatthūsu yaṃkiñci ekampi vatthuṃ dīpetvā tena tena kāraṇena “imaṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-vin02a3:535_7: imaṃ rocethā”ti saññāpetvā salākaṃ gāhāpetvā visuṃ saṅghakamme kate saṅgho bhinno hoti.
atk-vin02a3:535_8: Parivāre pana “pañcahi upāli ākārehi saṅgho bhijjatī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:535_9: tassa iminā idha vuttena saṅghabhedalakkhaṇena atthato nānākaraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-vin02a3:540_1: Vattakkhandhake idāni ārāmaṃ pavisissāmīti iminā upacārasīmasamīpaṃ dasseti;
atk-vin02a3:540_2: tasmā upacārasīmaṃ patvā upāhanāomuñcanādi sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:540_7: kālasseva piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ udāhu divā”ti evaṃ bhikkhācāro pucchitabbo.
atk-vin02a3:540_8: Agocaro nāma micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ vā gāmo paricchinnabhikkho vā gāmo;
atk-vin02a3:540_9: yattha ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā bhikkhā diyyati,
atk-vin02a3:540_11: Pānīyaṃ pucchitabbanti “kiṃ imissā pokkharaṇiyā pānīyaṃyeva pivanti,
atk-vin02a3:540_12: nahānādiparibhogampi karontī”ti evaṃ pānīyañceva paribhojanīyañca pucchitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:540_13: Kesuci ṭhānesu vāḷamigā vā amanussā vā honti,
atk-vin02a3:541_0: Bahi ṭhitenāti bahi nikkhamantassa ahino vā amanussassa vā maggaṃ datvā ṭhitena nilloketabbo.
atk-vin02a3:541_4: Sabbaṃ sodhetuṃ sakkontassa pana dassite vihārasodhanavatte vinicchayo mahākhandhake vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin02a3:544_2: āsanaṃ paññapetabbanti evamādi sabbaṃ vuḍḍhatare āgate cīvarakammaṃ vā navakammaṃ vā ṭhapetvāpi kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:544_3: Cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjantena sammajjaniṃ nikkhipitvā tassa vattaṃ kātuṃ ārabhitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:544_4: Paṇḍito hi āgantuko “sammajjāhi tāva cetiyaṅgaṇa”nti vakkhati.
atk-vin02a3:544_5: Gilānabhesajjaṃ karontena pana sace nātiāturo gilāno hoti,
atk-vin02a3:544_8: Paṇḍito hi āgantuko “karohi tāva bhesajja”nti vakkhati.
atk-vin02a3:544_9: Pānīyena pucchantena sace sakiṃ ānītaṃ pānīyaṃ sabbaṃ pivati,
atk-vin02a3:544_12: bījantena sakiṃ pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ bījitvā sakiṃ majjhe sakiṃ sīse bījitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:544_24: “Kattha mayhaṃ senāsanaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti pucchitena senāsanaṃ paññapetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:544_25: “etaṃ tumhākaṃ senāsanaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti evaṃ ācikkhitabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a3:545_1: pānīyaṃ ācikkhitabbanti “etaṃ pānīyaṃ gahetvā pivāhī”ti ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:545_4: Mahāāvāsepi attano santikaṃ sampattassa āgantukassa vattaṃ akātuṃ na labhati.
atk-vin02a3:548_3: Taṃ sabbaṃ aggisālāya vā aññatarasmiṃ vā guttaṭṭhāne paṭisāmetvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:548_5: Senāsanaṃ āpucchitabbanti ettha yaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu vā katasenāsanaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:548_8: Catūsu pāsāṇakesūtiādi upacikānaṃ uppattiṭṭhāne paṇṇasālādisenāsane kattabbākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:548_9: Appeva nāma aṅgānipi seseyyunti ayaṃ ajjhokāse ṭhapitamhi ānisaṃso.
atk-vin02a3:548_10: Ovassakagehe pana tiṇesu ca mattikāpiṇḍesu ca upari patantesu mañcapīṭhānaṃ aṅgānipi vinassanti.
atk-vin02a3:551_2: Catūhi pañcahīti saṅghattherena anumodanatthāya nisinne heṭṭhā paṭipāṭiyā catūhi nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:551_3: Anuthere nisinne mahātherena ca heṭṭhā ca tīhi nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:551_5: Saṅghattherena heṭṭhā daharabhikkhusmiṃ ajjhiṭṭhepi saṅghattherato paṭṭhāya catūhi nisīditabbameva.
atk-vin02a3:551_11: “Bahigāme āgamessāmā”ti ābhogaṃ katvāpi bahigāmaṃ gantvā attano nissitake “tumhe tassa āgamanaṃ āgamethā”ti vatvāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin02a3:551_12: Sace pana manussā attano rucikena ekena anumodanaṃ kārenti,
atk-vin02a3:551_15: Upanisinnakathāyameva hi manussesu kathāpentesu mahāthero āpucchitabbo,
atk-vin02a3:551_16: mahātherena ca anumodanāya ajjhiṭṭhova āgametabboti idamettha lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:554_2: manussānaṃ parivesanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantena cīvaraṃ pārupitvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhanameva vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:554_3: Na there bhikkhū anupakhajjāti there bhikkhū atiallīyitvā na nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:554_4: Sace mahātherassa nisinnāsanena samakaṃ āsanaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:554_5: bahūsu āsanesu sati ekaṃ dve āsanāni ṭhapetvā nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:554_6: Bhikkhū gaṇetvā paññattāsanesu anisīditvā mahātherena nisīdāti vuttena nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:554_10: Sace pana evaṃ āpucchitepi na vadati,
atk-vin02a3:554_13: Navako hi evarūpe āsane anāpucchā nisīdanto āpajjati,
atk-vin02a3:554_15: Na saṅghāṭiṃ ottharitvāti na saṅghāṭiṃ avattharitvā nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:555_1: Dakkhiṇodakaṃ pana purato ādhārake pattaṃ ṭhapetvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:556_0: Sūpassa okāsoti yathā sūpassa okāso hoti;
atk-vin02a3:556_2: Samakaṃ sampādehīti idaṃ na kevalaṃ sappiādīsuyeva odanepi vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:556_3: Sappiādīsu pana yaṃ appaṃ hoti ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā anurūpakaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:556_4: taṃ sabbesaṃ samakaṃ sampādehīti vutte manussānaṃ vihasā hoti,
atk-vin02a3:556_5: tasmā tādisaṃ sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā gahetvā sesaṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:557_0: Na tāva therena bhuñjitabbanti idaṃ yaṃ paricchinnabhikkhukaṃ bhattaggaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:557_1: yattha manussā sabbesaṃ pāpetvā dātukāmā honti,
atk-vin02a3:558_0: Na tāva udakanti idaṃ hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:558_1: Antarā pipāsitena pana gale vilaggāmisena vā pānīyaṃ pivitvā hatthā na dhovitabbā.
atk-vin02a3:558_2: Sace manussā “dhovatha bhante pattañca hatthe cā”ti vadanti,
atk-vin02a3:558_3: bhikkhū vā “tumhe udakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:559_0: Nivattantenāti bhattaggato uṭṭhāya nivattantena saṅghena evaṃ nivattitabbanti dasseti. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin02a3:559_2: Sambādhesu hi gharesu mahātherānaṃ nikkhamanokāso na hoti,
atk-vin02a3:559_4: Evaṃ nivattantehi pana navakehi gehadvāre ṭhatvā theresu nikkhantesu paṭipāṭiyā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:559_5: Sace pana mahātherā dhure nisinnā honti,
atk-vin02a3:559_8: Kāyena kāyaṃ aghaṭṭentena yathā antarena manussā gantuṃ sakkonti,
atk-vin02a3:562_2: kammaṃ vā nikkhipatīti kappāsaṃ vā suppaṃ vā musalaṃ vā yaṃ gahetvā kammaṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a3:562_5: Na ca bhikkhādāyikāyāti itthī vā hotu puriso vā,
atk-vin02a3:566_0: Pattaṃ thavikāya pakkhipitvāti ettha sace bahigāme udakaṃ natthi,
atk-vin02a3:566_1: antogāmeyeva bhattakiccaṃ katvā atha bahigāme atthi,
atk-vin02a3:566_2: bahigāme bhattakiccaṃ katvā patto dhovitvā vodako katvā thavikāya pakkhipitabbo.
atk-vin02a3:567_3: Tampi alabhantassa yathā samīpe udakaāvāṭo hoti,
atk-vin02a3:570_6: Athāpi “bhante āpucchitameva hotū”ti vutte vuḍḍhataro “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchati,
atk-vin02a3:570_10: Yena vuḍḍho tena parivattitabbanti vuḍḍhābhimukhena parivattitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:574_2: sati udaketi ettha sace udakaṃ atthi,
atk-vin02a3:574_7: “Idaṃ ativivaṭaṃ purato aññaṃ udakaṃ bhavissatī”ti gatassa udakaṃ alabhantasseva bhikkhācāravelā hoti,
atk-vin02a3:574_8: kaṭṭhena vā kenaci vā puñchitvā gantabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:574_10: Āgatapaṭipāṭiyāti vaccakuṭiyaṃ passāvaṭṭhāne nhānatittheti tīsupi āgatapaṭipāṭiyeva pamāṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:575_2: na dantakaṭṭhaṃ khādantenāti ayaṃ vaccakuṭiyāpi avaccakuṭiyāpi sabbattheva paṭikkhepo.
atk-vin02a3:575_3: Na pharusena kaṭṭhenāti phālitakaṭṭhena vā kharena vā gaṇṭhikena vā kaṇṭakena vā susirena vā pūtinā vā na avalekhitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:575_4: Avalekhanakaṭṭhaṃ pana aggahetvā paviṭṭhassa āpatti natthi.
atk-vin02a3:576_3: Yaṃ pana saṅghikepi vihāre ekadese nibaddhagamanatthāya kataṃ ṭhānaṃ hoti puggalikaṭṭhānaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a3:577_10: kaṭṭhena vā kenaci vā puñchitvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:582_2: (nandimukhiyā rattiyāti aruṇuṭṭhitakālepi hi nandimukhā viya ratti khāyati.
atk-vin02a3:582_6: Kasambukajātanti ākiṇṇadosatāya saṃkiliṭṭhajātaṃ.) Yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāmāti “aparisuddhā ānanda parisā”ti
atk-vin02a3:582_7: vacanaṃ sutvāyeva hi tena pakkamitabbaṃ siyā,
atk-vin02a3:582_8: evaṃ apakkamitvā yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamessati,
atk-vin02a3:583_1: Na āyatakeneva papātoti na paṭhamameva gambhīro;
atk-vin02a3:583_3: Ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattatīti vīcīnaṃ osakkanakandaraṃ mariyādavelaṃ nātikkamati.
atk-vin02a3:584_1: Channamativassatīti āpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādento aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati idametaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:584_2: Vivaṭaṃ nātivassatīti āpattiṃ āpajjitvā vivaranto aññaṃ nāpajjati idametaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:587_1: Ṭhapitaṃ hoti pātimokkhanti ettha pure vā pacchā vā ṭhapitampi aṭṭhapitaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:587_2: khette ṭhapitameva pana ṭhapitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a3:587_7: saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti ettha yāva re-
atk-vin02a3:587_11: kāre pana vutte ṭhapentena pacchā ṭhapitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a3:587_12: “Suṇātu me”ti anāraddheyeva ṭhapentena pure ṭhapitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:590_1: Amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapeti akatāyāti tena puggalena sā vipatti katā vā hotu akatā vā,
atk-vin02a3:590_3: Katākatāyāti katañca akatañca ubhayaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:591_0: Dhammikaṃ sāmaggiṃ na upetīti kammaṃ kopetukāmatāya saṅghassa kamme karīyamāne neva āgacchati,
atk-vin02a3:594_1: Yehi ākārehi yehi liṅgehi yehi nimittehīti ettha maggenamaggapaṭipādanādīsu ākārādisaññā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a3:594_2: Tena diṭṭhena tena sutena tāya parisaṅkāyāti ettha diṭṭhañca sutañca pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva.
atk-vin02a3:594_3: Sace pana tehi diṭṭhasutehi parisaṅkaṃ uppādeyya,
atk-vin02a3:597_1: Attādānaṃ ādātukāmenāti ettha sāsanaṃ sodhetukāmo bhikkhu yaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ attanā ādiyati,
atk-vin02a3:597_3: Akālo imaṃ attādānaṃ ādātunti ettha rājabhayaṃ corabhayaṃ dubbhikkhabhayaṃ vassārattoti ayaṃ akālo,
atk-vin02a3:598_8: Anatthasaṃhitaṃ idaṃ attādānanti ettha yaṃ jīvitantarāyāya vā brahmacariyantarāyāya vā saṃvattati,
atk-vin02a3:599_0: Na labhissāmi sandiṭṭhe sambhatte bhikkhūti appekadā hi rājabhayādīsu evarūpā attano pakkhassa upatthambhakā bhikkhū laddhuṃ na sakkā honti,
atk-vin02a3:599_2: Appekadā pana khemasubhikkhādīsu laddhuṃ sakkā honti,
atk-vin02a3:600_0: Bhavissati saṅghassa tatonidānaṃ bhaṇḍananti kosambakānaṃ viya bhaṇḍanaṃ kalaho viggaho vivādo saṅghabhedo ca bhavissatīti.
atk-vin02a3:600_1: Pacchāpi avippaṭisārakaraṃ bhavissatīti subhaddaṃ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṃ niggahetvā pañcasatikasaṅgītiṃ karontassa mahākassapattherasseva,
atk-vin02a3:600_2: dasavatthuke adhikaraṇe dasabhikkhusahassāni niggahetvā sattasatikasaṅgītiṃ karontassa āyasmato yasasseva,
atk-vin02a3:600_3: saṭṭhibhikkhusahassāni niggahetvā sahassikasaṅgītiṃ karontassa moggaliputtatissattherasseva ca pacchā samanussaraṇakaraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:603_1: Acchiddena appaṭimaṃsenātiādīsu yena gahaṭṭhapabbajitesu yo koci pahaṭo vā hoti,
atk-vin02a3:603_3: tassa kāyasamācāro upacikāhi khāyitatālapaṇṇamiva chiddo ca paṭimāsituṃ yattha katthaci gahetvā ākaḍḍhituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya sappaṭimaṃso ca hoti,
atk-vin02a3:603_5: Vacīsamācāro pana musāvādaomasavādapesuññaamūlakānuddhaṃsanādīhi chiddo ca sappaṭimaṃso ca hoti,
atk-vin02a3:604_0: Mettaṃ nu kho me cittanti palibodhe chinditvā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogena adhigataṃ mettacittaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:604_3: Idaṃ panāvuso kattha vuttaṃ bhagavatāti idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ katarasmiṃ nagare vuttanti attho.
atk-vin02a3:607_1: Kālena vakkhāmītiādīsu eko ekaṃ okāsaṃ kāretvā codento kālena vadati nāma.
atk-vin02a3:607_2: Saṅghamajjhagaṇamajjhasalākaggayāguaggavitakkamāḷakabhikkhācāramaggaāsanasālādīsu upaṭṭhākehi parivāritakkhaṇe vā codento akālena vadati nāma.
atk-vin02a3:607_8: patirūpaṃ tava ida”nti vadanto pharusena vadati nāma.
atk-vin02a3:607_13: patirūpaṃ tumhākaṃ ida”nti vadanto saṇhena vadati nāma.
atk-vin02a3:607_14: Kāraṇanissitaṃ katvā vadanto atthasaṃhitena vadati nāma.
atk-vin02a3:607_15: Mettacitto vakkhāmi no dosantaroti mettacittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā vakkhāmi,
atk-vin02a3:610_8: Vatthuṃ codetvā sāretvā paṭiññaṃ āropetvā yathāpaṭiññāya kammakaraṇaṃ vinayapurekkhāratā nāma.
atk-vin02a3:610_9: Ime pañca dhammeti ye ete kāruññatātiādinā nayena vuttā,
atk-vin02a3:610_10: ime pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ manasi karitvā paro codetabboti.
atk-vin02a3:611_0: Sacce ca akuppe cāti vacīsacce ca akuppanatāya ca.
atk-vin02a3:616_2: alaṃ gotami mā te ruccīti kasmā paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a3:616_3: nanu sabbesampi buddhānaṃ catasso parisā hontīti?
atk-vin02a3:616_5: kilametvā pana anekakkhattuṃ yācitena anuññātaṃ pabbajjaṃ “dukkhena laddhā ayaṃ amhehī”ti sammā paripālessantīti
atk-vin02a3:617_0: 403. Kumbhathenakehīti kumbhe dīpaṃ jāletvā tena ālokena paraghare bhaṇḍaṃ vicinitvā thenakacorehi.
atk-vin02a3:618_0: Setaṭṭhikā nāma rogajātīti eko pāṇako nāḷimajjhagataṃ kaṇḍaṃ vijjhati,

atk-vin02a3:622_3: Iti tā sabbāpi ekatoupasampannā nāma ahesuṃ.

atk-vin02a3:624_3: bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnaṃ kammaṃ ropetvā niyyādetunti ettha tajjanīyādīsu “idaṃ nāma kammaṃ etissā kātabba”nti
atk-vin02a3:624_4: evaṃ ropetvā “taṃ dāni tumheva karothā”ti niyyādetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:624_5: Sace pana aññasmiṃ ropite aññaṃ karonti,

atk-vin02a3:625_3: Avandiyo so bhikkhave bhikkhu bhikkhunisaṅghena kātabboti bhikkhunupassaye sannipatitvā “asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ apasādanīyaṃ dasseti,
atk-vin02a3:625_4: etassa ayyassa avandiyakaraṇaṃ ruccatī”ti evaṃ tikkhattuṃ sāvetabbaṃ.

atk-vin02a3:625_9: vā upasaṅkamitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “bhikkhunisaṅgho mayhaṃ khamatū”ti khamāpetabbaṃ.

atk-vin02a3:663_2: Tatra hi “sannidhi nāma ajja paṭiggahitaṃ aparajjū”ti vatvā puna “sannidhikārake asannidhikārakasaññī
atk-vin02a3:663_3: khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā āpatti pācittiyassā”ti āpattiṃ vadantena paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:663_4: Tatreke maññanti “yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā”ti hi vuttaṃ,

atk-vin02a3:663_6: Yampi aloṇakaṃ āmisaṃ paṭiggahetvā tena saddhiṃ paribhuñjati,
